title: Commercial Manager - remote
description:
**About the Role** 




  





 We are seeking a Commercial Manager to lead high-integrity client engagement and enrolment for our transformational personal growth and education programs. This is not a traditional sales environment — it’s a mission-led, remote-first space where growth, purpose, and resourcefulness converge.
 



  





 If you're ready to apply your commercial expertise toward meaningful impact, this is the move to evolve your career and elevate others in the process.
 



  





 We are a global company that is experiencing an exceptional growth and are looking for a talented and self-motivated people. We love self-mastery and offer inspiring programs crafted for individuals to inspire and motivate them to grow their potential and love of life. 
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* Lead the commercial activities with a focus on authentic relationship building and client alignment
* Drive high-touch, consultative commercial conversations with purpose-driven professionals
* Collaborate with marketing to refine lead generation and messaging strategy
* Identify and explore new growth markets with strategic foresight
* Mentor emerging sales team members on values-based sales and coaching-aligned communication
* Champion a client journey rooted in transformation, not transaction



  





**Who You Are** 



* A self-motivated, senior commercial professional who leads with vision, integrity, and purpose
* Experienced in transformational sales, personal and leadership development or values-aligned services
* Fluent in English and confident in high-level consultative communication
* Naturally empathetic and strategically minded, with the ability to inspire and influence
* You thrive in remote, flexible, autonomous work environments
* You’re an artist in sales — creative, intuitive, and adaptable
* You’re aligned with personal growth, emotional intelligence, and conscious leadership
* Possess a global, inclusive mindset and basic coaching or mentoring experience



  





**What We Offer** 



* 100% Remote Work – location independence with flexible hours
* A high-trust, purpose-driven work culture
* Ongoing personal and leadership development embedded into the role
* Growth-oriented peers and global collaborators
* Evolving uncapped earning potential with mission-aligned impact
* The space to lead with authenticity, curiosity, and creative autonomy
* Sustainable career model



  





**Apply now** 
  to turn your commercial leadership into a mission-aligned work-life balance opportunity — starting with your own.
 



  




* #CommercialManager #RemoteJobs #PersonalDevelopment #ConsultativeSales #LeadershipDevelopment #PurposeDrivenWork #Senior #Transformation #HumanPotential

title: Senior VMware-konsult
description:
Vill du bidra med din kompetens inom Broadcom/VMware och möta nya människor och miljöer, samtidigt som du får stora möjligheter att utvecklas i din yrkesroll? Fint! Då är du varmt välkommen till oss på Atea. Just nu söker vi dig i Stockholm som vill arbeta som VMware-konsult med fokus på automation och hjälpa våra kunder på deras digitala resa.
   

  

**Din roll**
 I rollen som VMware-konsult kommer du få möjlighet att arbeta med en bredd av olika kunder. Rollen kan innebära både långa heltidsuppdrag såväl som att ha flera spännande uppdrag löpande parallellt. Ditt ansvar är att hjälpa kunderna vidare med deras initiativ kopplat till VMware som plattform, leverera bästa möjliga service, samt aktivt arbeta för att rådge dem i deras resa framåt i tätt samarbete med våra säljare och arkitekter.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter:** 
  

  

* Arbeta med design, implementation, felsökning, förvaltning och utveckling av våra kunders VMware-plattformar och IT-infrastruktur med fokus automation
* Delta i projekt och uppdrag som teknisk rådgivare och/eller utförare samt leverera dokumentation efter utsatta krav
* Agera teknisk specialist och rådgivare (såväl internt som mot kund inom ditt/dina kompetensområden)
* Genomföra förstudier, analyser och workshops ute hos våra kunder
* Samarbeta med våra arkitekter vid framtagandet av design Datacenter-plattformar
* Supportera vår specialistsäljare vid framtagandet av lösningar inom Datacenter-plattformar
* Löpande utveckla din kompetens genom utbildning/certifiering samt genom att omvärldsbevaka och uppdatera dig gällande vad som händer på marknaden


 Du kommer att ingå i affärsområdet Hybrid Plattforms på Atea som arbetar främst datacenter med fokus på server, lagring och nätverk. Vi hjälper kunder att skapa hybrida miljöer som spänner över det traditionella datacentret till det publika molnet. Inom affärsområdet är vi totalt ca 25 konsulter i Stockholm.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga kompetenser, som är viktiga för att lyckas i rollen och trivas hos oss. I konsultrollen är du flexibel och trivs med att samarbeta med andra. Du uppskattar möjligheten att möta nya kunder och arbeta i en varierande vardag. Du är självgående och tar ansvar för dina uppgifter, strukturerar och prioriterar ditt arbete och driver dina processer framåt. Du söker aktivt efter nya utmaningar samt utvecklingsmöjligheter hos kunden, både för egen del såväl som för möjligheter för andra konsultkollegor.
   

  

**För tjänsten som konsult inom VMware ser vi att du har:**
* Mycket god kännedom om VMware´s produkter
* Hög erfarenhet av att arbeta med lösningar inom virtualisering av VMware-plattformar, infrastruktur och datacenter
* Erfarenhet av arbete med IT-infrastruktur inom datacenter från ett hårdvaruperspektiv (Dell, HPE, backup/DR och liknande)
* Svenskt medborgarskap och obehindrad i svenska och engelska språket i tal och skrift
* B-körkort


**Meriterande:**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta som konsult
* Hög kompetens inom VMware NSX samt VMware Cloud Foundation
* God kompetens inom VMware Aria Automation
* Relevanta certifikat inom ovan produktområden (VCP, VCAP, VCIX)
* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes, Tanzu och/eller OpenShift


**Om Atea**
 Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av IT-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med IT och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara IT-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar IT-värld.
   

  

 På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" – en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.
   

  

**Kontakt & mer information**
 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Marcus Albiin, Konsultchef, via marcus.albiin@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och ansök därmed redan idag.
   

  

 Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.En anställning hos oss kan även innebära placering i säkerhetsklassat uppdrag. Därmed kan en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll komma att genomföras både före och under anställning.
   

  

 Atea vill vara The Place To Be, den självklara platsen, för alla människor då vi värdesätter och jobbar aktivt med mångfald och inkludering.
   

  

**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**
**Följ oss i sociala medier**

title: Accounts Receivable Clerk
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation, and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1200+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office-based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder-led, profitable, and growing.
   

  

 We have an exciting opportunity for an Accounts Receivable Clerk to join our growing team. If you are passionate about the technology industry and want to work for a company that aligns with your interests, we might be the place for you! Canonical, and our world-class Ubuntu product, attracts some of the leading talent from around the world. Come and work with exceptional people and kick-start your career in Finance!
   

  

 Our Finance team is growing and it's a really exciting time to join the team. We are looking for bright, truly motivated people who have a passion for making a difference. You will be seeking an opportunity to drive process improvements and change, input your ideas, grow your career and truly contribute to the team.
   

  

 Your role will include ensuring accuracy of the A/R ledgers, processing customer invoices in a timely and accurate manner, registering customer payments, dealing with queries effectively and efficiently and maintaining compliance with processes and procedures. You will learn the fundamentals of how finance works in an organisation.
   

  

 In return, we will provide you with ample opportunity for career development, including offering you support for continuing education and the pursuit of professional Accounting certifications. You will report directly to our Global Controller who will help you develop into the role and guide you through your learnings.
   

  

 Location: This role will be based remotely in the EMEA region
   

  

 The role entails
   

  

* Maintain accuracy of our A/R ledgers and reconciliation of accounts
* Manage our customer data (names, addresses, etc.), validate and gain approval for new accounts, and maintain our audit record of customer data changes and approvals
* Process our customer invoices in a timely and accurate manner, including entry of invoices into accounting systems and maintain our files in a tidy and organised manner
* Efficiently resolve any problems prior to raising and issue of invoice
* Implement and comply with the Canonical credit control policy
* Maximise cash collection through the effective collection of debts and maintain records to track debt collection through to conclusion
* Ensure payments are received in line with contractual terms
* Help with our month end processes: bank reconciliations and balance sheet reconciliations
* Resolve questions/issues, escalating when appropriate in a timely manner
* Maintain compliance with processes and procedures, recommend corrective action when identified and maintain suitable records to demonstrate compliance


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Exceptional education achievements in an Accounting or Finance subject
* Excellent spreadsheet skills, including pivots, lookups etc.
* Excellent attention to detail, with great organization skills and the ability to meet deadlines
* Great communication skills that you will use when connecting directly with our customers
* A passion for the world of Finance with ambition to progress your career
* Experience using an enterprise level accounting system


 What we offer colleagues
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognize outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Team Member Assistance Program & Wellness Platform
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass and travel upgrades for long-haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open-source projects and the platform for AI, IoT, and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence; in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since our inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Communications & ESG Director - Verisure Nordics
description:
**Verisure is seeking an experienced and passionate Nordic Communications & ESG Director to join our Cluster Leadership team, reporting to the Nordics HR & Communications Director, with potential to grow into a direct report to the General Manager Nordics & Sweden.** 
 This role is pivotal for our growth, driving reputation, employee engagement, and business outcomes through strategic and impactful communications and ESG leadership.
 







**This is a rare opportunity to step into a high-growth, high-performing and profitable business with a clear mission: to protect what matters most. Verisure operates in a category with remarkably low market penetration, offering vast potential for expansion.** 
 Our growth is rapid, resilient, and highly profitable — powered by a recurring revenue model and deep, long-term customer relationships. What sets Verisure apart is the strength of our platform: a robust, scalable operating model and a high-performing culture rooted in purpose.
 







**This is a newly created, standalone role — reflecting the growing importance of Communications and ESG in our strategic agenda.** 
 As our organization continues to evolve, this role will play a critical part in shaping and building the function across the Nordics. You will have the opportunity to carry and expand what’s already in motion, while designing and driving new initiatives that support our future ambitions.
 







**We are seeking an exceptional corporate communications leader with a broad background spanning external  and internal communications, change and transformation, ESG, and stakeholder engagement.** 
 As Nordic Communications & ESG Director, you will impact on the communciations value chain — reputation, employee engagement, executive communications, ESG positioning and strategic messaging — delivering measurable impact across the organization. This newly created, high-visibility role is ideal for a top performer with a strategic mindset, strong project management skills, and hands-on experience. You will collaborate across multiple country teams and contribute to the broader Group Communications and ESG community, combining strategic insight with operational excellence to elevate our brand, culture, and business impact.
 







**We’re growing fast, we’re doing it right — and we’re still just getting started.** 








***Discover more on our website www.verisure.com and our I***
***nvestors Page***
***including our company presentation and annual report.***







**About Verisure**





**Verisure is the leading provider of professionally monitored security services with 24/7 response in Europe and Latin America.** 








 Every day, our dedicated teams use leading technology to Deter, Detect, Verify and Intervene to protect more than 5.7 million families and small businesses from intruders, fire, and health emergencies across 17 countries.
 



 With over 35 years of insights, experience and innovation, Verisure is known for category-creating marketing, sales excellence, innovative products and services, and customer-centricity.
 







 Our mission is to give our customers peace of mind by protecting what matters most to them. We believe that everyone has the right to feel safe and secure.
 







 Thanks to a strong focus on high quality service, we aim to have the most satisfied and loyal portfolio of customers in the industry. We estimate that we have some of the strongest growth and retention rates globally in consumer-facing services, which demonstrates our commitment to exceptional service levels and strong value proposition to our customers.
 







*For more information:* 
***www.verisure.com***
  
 










**Verisure in the Nordics**





**Verisure was founded in Sweden more than 35 years ago, we then quickly expanded across the Nordic geographies, this broader cluster represents important markets for Verisure, with an ambition to continue growing and expanding, delighting customers and shaping the monitored security category across Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Finland.**

 Sweden is the third largest market for Verisure, and Norway the fifth. Denmark and Finland play strategic roles in our portfolio. All of these markets have seen very strong growth over the last five years, and are #1 in their addressable market. Today we are proud to serve our customers with over 2000 committed colleagues across the footprint.
 








**Strengthening our image and reputation with a variety of stakeholders, and positioning Verisure as a trustworthy leading company is key to making the Nordics markets the most recognized and most preferred provider for home and small businesses security solutions.**











**The role of Communications & ESG Director – Verisure Nordics**





 The Communications Director is a newly created, high-impact role leading the function across the Nordics. Reporting to either the Nordic HR & Communications Director or the General Manager Nordics, you’ll collaborate closely with Management Teams, Communications Leaders, and Marketing Directors across four countries.
 







**This is a newly created, standalone role — reflecting the growing importance of Communications and ESG in our strategic agenda.** 
 As our organization continues to evolve, this role will play a critical part in shaping and building the function across the Nordics. You will have the opportunity to carry and expand what’s already in motion, while designing and driving new initiatives that support our future ambitions.
 







**Joining during a dynamic phase of growth and transformation, you’ll shape and execute the Nordics’ external and internal communications strategy, lead implementation across markets, and build capabilities that elevate brand presence and business impact.** 
 With significant autonomy, you'll tailor communications plans per market, working hand-in-hand with country leadership and business teams. As a trusted advisor, you'll provide strategic guidance and hands-on execution across reputation, media, and employee engagement—ensuring alignment between internal and external messaging. You'll also collaborate with Group-level teams, contributing to international communications strategies and projects.
 







**This is a rare opportunity to build the function from the ground up in a fast-growing B2C company. You'll work directly with senior leadership, influence business-critical messaging, and shape public perception—while advancing your career in a high-growth, high-impact environment.** 








 Main responsibilities and impact
 

**Strategic leadership in Corporate Communications**



* Lead, develop, and implement the internal and external communications strategy for the Nordic Cluster in support of our ambitious business goals.
* Design and deliver integrated communications campaigns that drive business growth.
* Develop and execute an internal communications program that fosters pride, alignment, and engagement across teams.
* Collaborate with Group Communications to localize global narratives and amplify their impact.
* Oversee media relations, including proactive storytelling and responsive issue management, leveraging a strong network of journalist relationships.
* Produce compelling content across formats—press releases, blog posts, videos, social media, and executive speeches—that brings Verisure’s priorities to life.
* Lead and manage reputational issues and crisis communications in coordination with local markets.
* Monitor and manage corporate reputation using a range of KPIs.
* Effectively manage the communications budget to maximize return on investment.
* Stay informed on industry trends, developments, and news, acting as our antenna for local market insights.
* Develop a comprehensive communications dashboard in collaboration with local leads to drive transparency, identify trends, and optimize impact.
* Build a strong and engaged communications community, ensuring the right capabilities and talent are in place. Promote best-in-class practices and knowledge-sharing across the cluster so great ideas scale quickly and effectively.
* Lead and co-create horizontal networks with markets to enable rapid learning and execution.







**Engaging and impactful internal and external Communication Execution**



* Write, review, and edit a wide range of content tailored to different audiences—including strategic plans, presentations, messaging frameworks, talking points, Q&As, website copy, video scripts, external statements, and press releases.
* Serve as a company spokesperson, representing Verisure in the media. Ensure the brand leads public discourse and shapes perception around security for homes and small businesses.
* Oversee the company’s digital presence, including corporate website content and social media channels.







**Lead, develop and lift ESG while building relationships and reputation strategy**



* Lead and elevate ESG practices across the Nordics, coordinating efforts across countries to scale impact and crafting compelling narratives that highlight ongoing initiatives.
* Build and manage the company’s reputation by communicating our values, mission, and achievements to key external stakeholders—including media, partners, industry groups, and civil society organizations.
* Identify and cultivate strategic relationships that enhance Verisure’s external reputation and showcase the positive impact we make in society.
* In close collaboration with Group Legal and local teams, develop a Public Affairs strategy that supports our commercial goals and mitigates potential risks. Provide communications support to Legal in interactions with regulators.
* Partner with the marketing team to ensure consistent brand messaging across all communication channels and contribute to strategies that strengthen brand reputation.







**Candidate profile** 






 Experience and Qualifications
 





**We are looking for a top performer - proactive, solution-oriented, and driven to deliver meaningful impact. Someone who sees Verisure not just as a job, but as a long-term career destination. A high-calibre, high-energy individual with a strong communications background, robust project management skills, and potential for development.** 
 You bring a strategic mindset, hands-on execution capability, and a proactive business orientation. Adaptable, curious, and growth-driven, you’re ready to shape how we tell our story and strengthen our market presence. Someone we can truly invest in and grow into one of Verisure’s next-generation leaders.
 






* **Minimum of 15 years of experience in corporate and external communications roles, within global, fast-paced B2C environments, including sectors such as retail, telco, FMCG, and subscription-based services.**
* **Substantial experience in international, multicultural organizations, with hands-on leadership of remote and cross-functional teams across diverse markets.**
* Bachelor’s degree or higher, preferably in communications, public relations, marketing, business administration, or a related field.
* Strong experience managing media relations, acting as company spokesperson, and leading issues and crisis communications.
* Proven ability to develop and execute impactful brand and communications strategies aligned with broader commercial and reputational goals. Demonstrated excellence in writing, messaging, and interpersonal communication, with meticulous attention to detail and a track record of delivering high-quality work.
* Proven project management skills, successfully leading complex, cross-functional projects involving multiple departments to drive strategic alignment and timely execution. Experienced in managing multiple, simultaneous initiatives in fast-paced environments, ensuring quality, accuracy, and adherence to deadlines.
* Skilled in navigating competing priorities, balancing customer-centric communication needs with business demands to deliver measurable outcomes.
* Known for building strong, trust-based relationships with senior stakeholders, influencing through business acumen and clear, compelling communication.
* Growth-minded and curious, with a drive to challenge the status quo and elevate communication practices across channels and markets.
* Native Swedish speaker with fluency in English (written and spoken) is essential. Proficiency in other Nordic languages is a strong asset.











 Competencies
 
* **Problem Solving and Analytics** 
 – strong at structuring complex problems through quantitatively sound analysis, demonstrating exceptional business and commercial judgment. Ability to synthesize information into actionable conclusions enabling efficient decision making.
* **Agility and Flexibility** 
 - thrives in dynamic environments, adapting swiftly to new information and changing circumstances, and with a solid ability to navigate and operate successfully amidst complexity.
* **Effectiveness and Impact** 
 - self-motivated, proactive in self-development and demonstrates a hands-on approach to deliver by rolling up their sleeves and deep dive into the details
* **Entrepreneurial** 
 - forward thinker who can challenge the status quo while maintaining a strong customer focus. Willing to take a "hands on" approach, while keeping strategic objectives in mind.
* **Project Management** 
  - excellent project manager who can step in an structure problems, launches and proactively address and follow through on issues to ensure outstanding execution
* **Communication** 
 - active listener, with high emotional intelligence and decision-making ability with discernment, who communicates clearly and effectively, projecting credibility, capable of influencing stakeholders across various levels. Also good at managing confidentiality.







 Strong fit with our Company DNA
 

**Passionate in Everything We Do:** 
 Our people bring a contagious energy and a sense of urgency that is unmistakable. We create a vision and inspire others around that vision with full engagement and focus. We are all-in, and we love what we do.
 



**Committed to Making a Difference:** 
 We are courageous, we deliver what we promise through hard work and resilience. We make a difference, through operating with discipline and doing what is needed. We are hands-on, and we aren’t afraid to get into the detail. We deliver results and we execute with excellence.
 



**Always Innovating:** 
 Our people make the impossible possible; it’s a continuous state of mind. We are purpose-driven, curious and we challenge the status quo. We believe good ideas travel, we share and reapply. We take smart risks, and we are not afraid to fail. We believe innovation can be big or small. 
 



**Winning as a Team:** 
 We are determined to become number 1, and to do that we need to listen to one another, collaborate and work together. We play our part, fueled by a winning attitude and a fighting spirit. We celebrate our successes. We play to our strengths and our diversity to deliver even better outcomes, while developing and supporting one another. We believe that together we go further, and that nothing is impossible.
 



**With Trust & Responsibility:** 
 Our people take responsibility for the people we protect. We are accountable and reliable. We role model operating with integrity. We trust and empower one another to do the right thing, always. We deliver on our promise through world-class expertise and meticulous know-how. And we do this with humility while being honoured to play such an important role in society.
 







 Strong fit with Verisure RISE Leadership Model
 





**R** 
**ole Model Responsible Owner:** 
 Acting as a long-term owner, always putting the customer first, thinking and acting big and being accountable and responsible.
 



**I** 
**nspire Outstanding Performance:** 
 Motivating others for high performance, prioritising and making decisions with an analytical approach and executing with excellence.
 



**S** 
**trengthen and grow a high-performance, diverse organisation:** 
 Building high-performance and diverse teams, enhancing a learning culture by setting continuously higher standards.
 



**E** 
**mpower and lead with courage, integrity, and purpose:** 
 Inspiring our people, honouring our mission and purpose by leading with confidence, positive energy and genuine empathy and humility.
 







 Diversity, inclusion, equity, and belonging at Verisure
 





 At Verisure, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace, recognising that diversity of thought and background only makes our teams stronger and more innovative. We reject all forms of discrimination and bias, and we believe in access to opportunities for everyone, regardless of gender, age, disability status, race, sexual orientation, or any other status.

title: Mechanical Design Engineer
description:
**Techster Solutions** 
 befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst
 **5+** 
 års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
   

  

 Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
   

  

 Rollbeskrivning:
   

  

**Assignment**
 We are looking for two skilled engineers to support work within retarder and PTO systems for our client in Södertälje.
   

  

***Your main tasks will be to:***
* Design and update assembly drawings and technical documentation
* Develop and refine concepts to ensure optimal performance and manufacturability
* Solve complex engineering challenges with innovative and practical solutions
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality results


**Your profile:**
* Master of Science degree
* Fluent in Swedish and English
* Strong skills in CATIA V5 and ENOVIA
* Experience with R&D processes and tools such as PD Process, FRAS, ECO


**Ansökan**
 Tror du att du är
 **Techster Solutions** 
 nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Arbetsplats och kultur
   

  

 Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
   

  

 Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Säkerhetskonsult inom Microsoft
description:
Är du passionerad om cybersäkerhet och vill arbeta med de senaste teknologierna inom Microsofts ekosystem? Vill du vara en del av ett team där innovation, kompetens och gemenskap står i centrum? Då kan det här vara ditt nästa steg!
   

  

**Om rollen – Din chans att stärka cybersäkerheten i framkant! 🛡️**
 Som
 **Säkerhetskonsult inom Microsoft** 
 hos oss får du en
 **central roll i att hjälpa våra kunder skydda sina IT-miljöer** 
 . Du kommer att:
   

  

* Analysera och identifiera säkerhetsbehov hos våra kunder, med fokus på Microsofts ekosystem.
* Utforma och implementera säkerhetslösningar som skyddar mot dagens och morgondagens hot.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste trenderna och teknologierna inom cybersäkerhet.
* Samarbeta med olika team för att skapa säkra, effektiva och hållbara IT-lösningar.
* Utbilda och vägleda kunder i bästa praxis för en säker digital arbetsmiljö.


 Den här rollen är perfekt för dig som vill
 **kombinera teknisk expertis med strategiskt tänkande** 
 och samtidigt göra verklig skillnad för företag och organisationer! 🚀
   

  

**Vi söker dig som…**
* Har erfarenhet som konsult inom IT-säkerhet, gärna inom Microsofts ekosystem. ✅ Är kunnig inom identitetshantering, hotdetektering och säkerhetsarkitektur.
* Har erfarenhet av verktyg som Microsoft Defender, Sentinel, Entra ID (tidigare Azure AD) och liknande.
* Är en problemlösare som gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad om de senaste säkerhetshoten.
* Har en god förståelse för både tekniska och organisatoriska säkerhetsutmaningar.
* Talar och skriver flytande svenska, för att det krävs i det dagliga arbetet.


**Vad vi erbjuder 💜**
**Flexibilitet** 
 – vi tror på balans mellan arbete och fritid.
   

  

**Utvecklingsmöjligheter** 
 – utbildningar, certifieringar och nätverkande inom säkerhetsområdet.
   

  

**En inkluderande och engagerad företagskultur** 
 – vi tror på att ha kul på jobbet!
   

  

**Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmåner** 
 – för att du ska känna dig trygg och motiverad.
   

  

**Spännande projekt** 
 – jobba med ledande företag och organisationer i säkerhetskritiska miljöer.
   

  

**Vem är vi? 🤗**
 Vi är
 **B3 Cloud** 
 , en del av B3 Consulting Group – ett av Sveriges ledande konsultbolag. Vi hjälper våra kunder att bygga framtidens IT-miljöer genom modern molnteknik och cybersäkerhet. Vi är ett
 **team på cirka 40 experter inom moln och säkerhet** 
 , och vi älskar att samarbeta, utvecklas och lösa komplexa utmaningar tillsammans! 💡
   

  

**Om B3 Consulting Group**
*B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på* 
 tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.
   

  

*Vi är stolta över vår prisbelönta företagskultur, där olikheter, erfarenheter och gemensam energi värdesätts. Som ett etiskt och transparent bolag strävar vi efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi är även engagerade i Women in Tech och initiativ för att stärka AI-utbildning för kvinnor. 2024 utsågs vi till Årets Employer Branding-företag, och vår HR-chef vann titeln Årets HR-chef.*
 💌
 **Låter det spännande?** 
 Hör av dig! Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!

title: Routing Manager
description:
**About The Role**
 We’re looking for a hands-on Last-Mile Routing Manager who thrives on turning complex delivery flows into smooth, efficient operations. In this role, you’ll take ownership of route planning and optimisation for our Box & Home services, making sure our deliveries are on time, efficient, and ready to handle peaks and seasonal changes.
   

  

 You’ll lead and develop a team of five full-time and three part-time routing specialists, working closely with our Courier Engagement and Operations teams to ensure capacity, quality, and efficiency are always at their best. You’ll also work closely with stakeholders across the business to challenge, improve, and evolve our processes – so confidence, persistence, and great relationship-building skills are key.
   

  

**Some of the things you will do**
* Plan ahead – Create quarterly and seasonal capacity plans, ensuring we’re ready for weekends, peak periods, and summer volumes.
* Set goals & follow up – Define team and individual targets, monitor performance on all levels, provide constructive feedback, and drive continuous improvements.
* Organise & optimise – Adapt processes, workflows, and responsibilities to meet operational needs, making sure your team has the tools and conditions to succeed.
* Lead & inspire – Motivate your team, foster a positive culture, and communicate clearly through changes and challenges.
* Report & collaborate – Keep the team updated on company and department news, prepare relevant data for reports, and coordinate with other teams.
* Solve problems & decide fast – Support your team in day-to-day challenges, make well-informed decisions, and keep operations moving forward.
* Drive development together – Work closely with other functions in Central Operations to identify opportunities, test new ideas, and implement improvements that benefit the wider organisation.


**What We're Looking For**
* Proven leadership skills with the ability to coach, inspire, and develop a team.
* Confident in challenging and improving processes while maintaining strong stakeholder relationships.
* Resilient and persistent – you can stand your ground while keeping collaboration at the forefront.
* Strong analytical mindset and experience working with KPIs, reporting, and data tools (Tableau or similar).
* Background in logistics, distribution, or route planning is highly meriting.
* Excellent organisational skills – you can keep many moving parts aligned without losing focus on the details.
* A clear and confident communicator in English and Swedish.


 If this is you then we can’t wait to meet you!
   

  

**What You’ll Get**
 We can promise you that you will be challenged, develop your skills and have the opportunity to work with truly amazing and competent colleagues. If you like changes and want to set new processes and ways of working - this is the place for you!
   

  

**Benefits**
 Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:
   

  

* 🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.
* 🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!
* 🏓 Fun & Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.
* 👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care and love to your little one.
* 🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!m for your leisure time.
* ⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.


 Diversity and inclusion is very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.
   

  

**Get to know us**
 In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the consumer at heart.
   

  

 We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for you to help us on the journey ahead.
   

  

*This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee in Sweden.*
 Instabee, with consumer-facing brands Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy, was founded in 2022, but the collective experience dates back much further. Today, Instabee is present in six markets, serving thousands of online merchants and millions of consumers with easy home deliveries or convenient parcel locker deliveries, using the best fuel available.
   

  

 With smart tech, a focus on the environment, and a secure supply chain, Instabee has become the key partner of online merchants and the obvious choice for end-consumers, backed by notable investors such as Kinnevik, Creades, and EQT Ventures, among others.

title: WFM professionals interested in growing their careers with Legion
description:
At PBS Nordics, a Capgemini business unit, we empower individuals to shape their careers within a collaborative global community. Specializing in ERP transformation services for both public and private sectors, PBS Nordics delivers tailored solutions using top ERP systems like SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and IFS. With a strong Nordic presence and a diverse global client portfolio, we guide organizations through seamless ERP transformations, driving operational excellence and strategic growth.
   

  

**Your role**
 As a Workforce Management (WFM) professional, you’ll transition into a WFM TechnoFunctional Consultant role, joining our team to work with the Legion platform — an industry-leading, AI-native workforce management solution designed to maximize labor efficiency and employee engagement. You’ll start by receiving full training on Legion, and once trained, you’ll apply your existing experience with tools like Kronos, UKG, ATOSS, or Workday WFM to support and implement Legion-based solutions for our clients.
   

  

*In this role you will play a key role in:*
* Supporting the implementation and configuration of the Legion workforce management platform, building on your experience with tools like Kronos, UKG, ATOSS, Quinyx, Calabrio or Workday WFM
* Troubleshooting functional and technical issues across modules such as scheduling, timekeeping, accruals, and absence management
* Applying your understanding of workforce processes, including time capture, pay policies, and attendance to deliver effective solutions
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including developers and project managers, to ensure successful project outcomes


**Your profile**
* A minimum of 3 years of experience in WFM
* Proficiency in using WFM tools such as Kronos (Workforce Central and Dimensions), UKG PRO, ATOSS, and Workday
* Experience in Timekeeping, Pay Policies, Accruals, Scheduling, Forecasting, Absence Management, Access Management, Reporting and working with clock devices
* Participated in implementation projects, supported system upgrades, and provided ongoing system support
* Strong understanding of end-to-end HR processes, including hiring, time capture, and payroll
* Familiar with modules like Global Time Off, Advanced Scheduling, Accruals, Attestation, Activities, Devices, Display Profiles, Leave/Absence Setup, and Attendance
* Skilled in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to clock hardware


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training, a global network of experts and an innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success.
* Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.
* A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, Fun, and Boldness.
* A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.


**Application**
 In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis. As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.
   

  

**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries.
   

  

 With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want** 
 | www.capgemini.com

title: Applikationsnära DevOps-tekniker
description:
Svenska kraftnät är en nyckelaktör i energiomställningen. Vår IT-division växer för att möjliggöra en fördubblad elproduktion och en fossilfri framtid. Med den senaste tekniken ökar vi både infrastrukturens kapacitet och utvecklingstakten inom digitalisering och processer.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Vi söker DevOps-tekniker till en av enheterna för Balanseringsapplikationer som styr kraftnätet. Som DevOps-tekniker kommer du huvudsakligen att arbeta med systemförvaltning och vidareutveckling av applikationer. Detta inkluderar underhåll och övervakning av systemen. En viktig del av ditt arbete blir att driva och genomföra uppgraderingar samt förbättringar av systemen, med ett särskilt fokus på vidareutveckling för att möta framtida behov och utmaningar.
   

  

 Vi söker flera personer på olika nivåer, både nyexaminerade och seniora. Oavsett nivå kommer du att vara en del av ett team som arbetar för att säkerställa driften och utvecklingen av våra kritiska applikationer och tjänster. Vi erbjuder möjligheter till utveckling och specialisering inom dina intresseområden. Du kommer bland annat att jobba med moderna lösningar baserat på Open Shift och Kafka.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer innebära att:
   

  

* Hantera incidenter, problem och felsökningar i 2:a linjen, automatisera flöden och bidra till att förbättra teamets arbetssätt och rutiner. Ge stöd och support till interna och externa parter.
* Bistå vid teknisk kravspecificering och vara med i att ta fram nya lösningar och skapa integrationer mellan olika system och lösningar, för att effektivisera verksamheten och distributionen av elkraft i Norden.
* Arbeta med att skapa och underhålla automatiska byggtester, säkerhetsgranskningar och driftsättning av applikationer och tjänster i våra system.
* Samordna olika typer av tester samt genomföra delar av dem själv, tillsammans med verksamheten och våra säkerhets- och testspecialister.


 Rollen bidrar till en viktig del i utvecklingen av Sveriges kraftsystem genom aktiv förvaltning. Du ingår i ett agilt team bestående av systemansvariga, lösningsarkitekter, DevOps-tekniker och testare. Teamets främsta uppgift är att vidmakthålla befintligt system och att utveckla nya lösningar på den nordiska och europeiska balansmarknaden.
   

  

**Om dig**
**Skallkrav**
 För denna roll behöver du ha en god service- och samarbetsförmåga då rollen innefattar många interna och externa kontaktytor. Du har en analytisk förmåga och tycker om att lösa komplexa problem som ska gynna de strategiska målen. Arbetsbelastningen kan skifta och därför behöver du vara stabil och lugn i en växande och händelserik organisation. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Generellt för rollen vill vi att
   

  

* Du har en akademisk examen inom systemvetenskap, datavetenskap eller annan utbildning som Svenska kraftnät bedömer relevant.
* Du är kommunikativ och uttrycker dig väl på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


 För dig som är nyexaminerad vill vi att du har
   

  

* Praktisk erfarenhet av programmeringsarbete, problemlösning och problemanalys.
* God teknisk förståelse för systemutveckling och systemmiljöer


 För dig som har arbetslivserfarenhet vill vi att du har
   

  

* Något eller några års erfarenhet med system/applikationsförvaltning enligt ITIL, PM3 eller motsvarande ramverk/styrningsmodell med verksamhetskritiska system.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av operativsystemet Linux eller Unix.
* Erfarenhet av felsökning, test och vidareutveckling av integrationsgränssnitt.
* Praktisk erfarenhet inom ett par av följande områden: Java eller Python, samt XML och SQL.
* Vana att dokumentera.


 Det är
 **meriterande** 
 om du har arbetat med
   

  

* Systemintegration, RH Fuse, JMS eller Webservices
* Agila metoder (Scrum, SAFe, etc)
* Github/Gitlab, Kubernetes eller Docker containers
* DevOps


**Bra att veta**
* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
* Resor kan förekomma inom Norden
* Sista ansökningsdag är den 1 september 2025. Du kommer att få svara på ett antal frågor istället för personligt brev, därför behöver vi bara ditt CV.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning och beredskap kommer att ingå när du kommit in i rutinerna. Provanställning kan bli aktuellt.
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


**Vid frågor om tjänsten kontakta gärna**
* Rekryterande chef Per Lundblad, 072 560 15 01
* Ansvarig rekryterare Victoria Waltenberg, 010 350 90 45
* Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72
* Erica Midfjäll, ST, 010 475 87 31


 Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se. Under semestertider kan svarstiden kan vara något längre än vanligt.
   

  

 Jobba här – bli en viktig del av vår energiframtid | Svenska kraftnät
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare i samband med rekrytering, vi har upphandlade avtal som gäller för Svenska kraftnät som statlig myndighet.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: IT-säkerhetskonsult till Simovits Consulting

description:

Sök idag - urval sker löpande!*

 nSom IT-säkerhetskonsult hos Simovits Consulting får du insyn i en spännande och starkt växande sektor inom informationsteknologi.  För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egensk** 
 aper: Du är analytiskt lagd och duktig på att presentera det du kommit fram till skriftligen såväl som muntligen. Du är strukturerad, socialt lagd och gillar att samarbeta med andra. Vidare behöver du ta ansvar för ditt arbete och vara noggrann, transparent och kre
