title: Lead Cloud Architect
description:
**Google Cloud Journey as a Lead Cloud Architect at Codento** 




 Do you want to be among the best of Google Cloud technology and be an integral part of growing new business in Sweden, as well as our Nordic growth journey? Do you thrive in an empathetic, low-hierarchical, self-directed, and entrepreneurial work environment? If so, Codento might have the perfect opportunity for you!
 



 At Codento, we are dedicated to delivering exceptional value to customers across diverse industries through the power of cloud technology, software solutions, and AI.
 



 Google Cloud stands out as the fastest-growing cloud platform, and the demand for expertise in this domain is soaring. As our Swedish team expands, we're on the lookout for a talented Lead Cloud Architect to tackle complex consulting projects.
 



  

  





**Your tasks during our growth journey:** 




 As a Lead Cloud Architect at Codento, you plan and work hands-on with architecture and AI solutions in the cloud.
 



 You work with cloud technology tools that deepen and expand your already possessed know-how. You will learn a lot, especially about Google Cloud, and that is also expected of you in this position.
 







 You will also be working closely with our friends at Google Cloud as well as our Codento Nordic teams. You help the sales team to open up customer relationships with your expertise, and you are involved in building teams around them.
 







 We will also involve you in planning the long-term strategic aspects and overall skills development of Codento.
 



 Read the next section to learn what this means technology-wise.
 



  

  





**When you join us, we expect you to have:** 




**Must-haves** 



* Previous strong knowledge of working with Google Cloud architecture (or very strong Azure/AWS skills and a desire to learn Google Cloud’s tricks quickly)
* Background in software development and understanding of software production
* A strong understanding of the consulting/service business and great skills in working with different stakeholders
* Excellent communication skills



**Nice-to-haves** 



* Track record of leading projects/teams
* Understanding of AI tools and practices
* Valid GCP Certification
* Growth / entrepreneurial mindset
* Swedish language proficiency



  

  

**Why should you choose Codento?** 








 We provide a vibrant and exciting work environment where you can grow and boost your personal development by using cutting-edge technologies while working on helping our customers solve complex business challenges. We have a small but growing enthusiastic team located in the city of Stockholm.
   









 What we expect from everyone (our values):
 


* Pioneering: The ability to confidently navigate change and a strong hunger for learning new skills.
* Perseverance: Determination and a shared commitment to achieving our common objectives.
* Empathy: The capacity to empathize and collaborate effectively with others.



 When you join Codento, you join a brilliant team of experts to start building a dream team to Sweden, with strong support from our Google Cloud experts in Finland.
 



  

  





**Interested? Wondering about something?** 




 Apply via the link to our recruitment system! The form is easy and quick to fill. At least leave either your CV or/and LinkedIn profile and answer the multiple choice questions. You can also write a short cover letter if you want.
 



 If you want to know more about us, please visit our website. There you will find many customer cases and blogs from which you can reflect on whether we’re a good fit for you. :)

title: Stockholms starkaste lösningsarkitekt ServiceNow
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**Om Sopra Steria:**
 Sopra Steria är Europas ledande konsultföretag inom ServiceNow och digital transformation. Vi hjälper företag och organisationer att effektivisera sina verksamheter genom innovativa teknologilösningar. Med fler än 4000 ServiceNow-experter besitter vi marknadens största och mest framstående ServiceNow-team där får du möjligheten att arbeta med dem mest spännande projekten samt utvecklas i en dynamisk och framåtlutad arbetsmiljö. Nu tar vi nästa stora kliv och satsar ännu hårdare på vår ledande position inom ServiceNow. Hos oss får du chansen att vara med och driva utvecklingen framåt, forma framtidens lösningar och göra verklig skillnad. Vill du vara en del av vårt ledande team?
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 I rollen som lösningsarkitekt inom ServiceNow kommer du vara en central del i utvecklingen och designen av moderna lösningar för att effektivisera arbetsflöden och processer. Som Elite Partner för ServiceNow har vi en av Skandinaviens största och mest kvalificerade konsultgrupper med närmare 500 dedikerade experter. Vi söker nu en senior profil som kan ta en ledande roll i våra teamleveranser tillsammans med våra experter som utvecklar innovativa lösningar för våra kunder.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter:**
* Designa och implementering avancerade lösningar inom ServiceNow.
* Ledande roll i att utveckla och konfigurera plattformen för att möta specifika krav och behov.
* Arbeta nära affärsavdelningar för att förstå och översätta deras verksamhetsbehov till tekniska lösningar.
* Driva tekniska workshops och rådgivning gentemot kunder.
* Aktiv deltagande i agila team och förmåga att leda och inspirera.


**För att vara framgångsrik i rollen tror vi att du har:**
* Flerårig erfarenhet som arkitekt inom ServiceNow med uppsättning, implementering, utveckling och konfiguration inom plattformen.
* Expertis inom Javascript, HTML, SQL och ITIL.
* Vana av att arbeta i agila team.
* Relevanta certifieringar inom ServiceNow.
* Eftergymnasial utbildning.
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Vi erbjuder:**
* En spännande arbetsmiljö hos Europas ledande ServiceNow-konsultbolag.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa lösningar och den senaste tekniken.
* Kompetensutveckling genom certifieringar, utbildningar och mentorskap.
* Hybrid arbetsmodell samt konkurrenskraftiga villkor och förmåner


**Om ServiceNow-teamet på Sopra Steria:**
 Sopra Steria är Nordens ledande expert inom ServiceNow – vi har den största och mest specialiserade kompetensen på marknaden. Vårt starka och sammansvetsade team levererar omfattande och högkvalitativa lösningar, där flera av våra erfarna ServiceNow-konsulter samarbetar för att maximera värdet för våra kunder. Vi drivs av innovation, samarbete och kunskapsutbyte – tillsammans sätter vi nya standarder och skapar framtidens digitala lösningar. Vill du arbeta med de bästa? Då är Sopra Steria platsen för dig.
   

  

**Om Sopra Steria:**
 Sopra Steria är en av Europas ledande aktörer inom digital transformation, med över 60 000 medarbetare i mer än 30 länder globalt. Vi driver innovation och hjälper företag och organisationer att effektivisera, utvecklas och skapa långsiktigt värde genom banbrytande teknologilösningar.
   

  

 Hos oss arbetar de främsta experterna inom sina områden i en dynamisk och framtidsorienterad miljö där samarbete, nytänkande och teknisk spetskompetens står i centrum.
   

  

**Ansökan:**
 Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och vara en del av en framstående arbetsplats, ansök genom att ladda upp ditt CV. Kontakta gärna ansvarig rekryterare, Teodor Nellvik (teodor.nellvik@soprasteria.com) eller Business Owner Mikael Kroglund (mikael.kroglund@soprasteria.com) för eventuella frågor om tjänsten.
   

  

 På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

**Välkommen till Sopra Steria - där din kompetens formar framtidens digitala lösningar!**
**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Inside Sales Representative - Nordics
company_industry: Retail Apparel and Fashion, Financial Services, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**OUR STORY:**
 🇪🇺 Join Scaleway and shape the sovereign cloud of tomorrow !
   

  

 Since 1999, we have been designing secure, sustainable infrastructures aimed at supporting the most ambitious companies.
   

  

 Historically known for our dedicated servers (Dedibox), we made a strategic shift to cloud computing in 2015. Staying true to our principles of simplicity, flexibility, and technical excellence, we have become one of the leading players in Europe in the sector.
   

  

 With the rise of artificial intelligence, we have strengthened our commitment, supported by the Iliad Group, which is investing €3 billion to develop a serious, sovereign AI alternative to American and Asian giants.
   

  

 Every day, thanks to our rich catalog of products and services (bare metal, containerization, serverless, AI, etc.), Scaleway proudly serves 38,000 private and public sector clients, from Photoroom to Mistral AI, Golem AI, and ADEME.
   

  

 📍 Our offices are located in
 **Paris, Lille, Toulouse, Bordeaux, Rouen, Rennes and Lyon.**
**WHY WE NEED YOU?**
 Our growth is driving us to strengthen our Sales team to support our strategic expansion in the Nordic region.
   

  

 Your mission will be to identify and engage with key accounts in Sweden and across the Nordics in order to generate qualified opportunities for our Account Executives and contribute to our international business growth.
   

  

**YOUR FUTURE TEAM**
 We work in a collaborative and international environment where the diversity of Scalers, combined with a spirit of sharing, helps bring new projects to life every day, advancing our ambitions together.
   

  

 You will be part of a team of 11 people, working closely with Account Executives as a duo to develop a strong pipeline in your territory.
   

  

 The team is led by Pilar Balhadere and organized around a Manager, a Team Lead, and Inside Sales Representatives. Each ISR is assigned 200 strategic target accounts and works with sales architects and AEs to engage them through multi-channel outreach.
   

  

**YOUR DAILY ROUTINE**
* Conduct outbound prospecting via cold calls, cold emails, and social selling
* Manage email campaigns to generate qualified leads
* Map accounts and identify key stakeholders
* Collaborate closely with Account Executives on territory planning and deal strategy
* Use tools such as Outreach, Salesforce, Lusha, Humanlinker, and Confluence to manage your activity
* Track progress and report performance on your accounts
* Participate in team-based prospecting initiatives and events
* Continuously learn about Scaleway’s offerings and cloud industry trends
* Engage with technical teams when needed to address prospect needs
* Maintain a hunting and growth-oriented mindset


**About You**
**HARDSKILLS :**
* 1+ year of experience in a Sales Development / Inside Sales / Business Development role
* Previous experience in IT, SaaS, or cloud environments (minimum 6 months to 1 year)
* Proficient with sales tools (Salesforce, Outreach, Lusha, etc.)
* Strong understanding of sales prospecting and outbound strategies
* Fluent in Swedish and English
* Nice to Have : French


**SOFTSKILLS :**
* Strong hunter mindset: goal-driven, persistent, proactive
* Comfortable with cold calling and initiating conversations
* Social and charismatic: able to build rapport easily
* Team-oriented and collaborative
* Curious and eager to learn in a fast-paced environment


**🚀Why join the Scaleway adventure?**
 ✔ A rich and diverse product offering: Scaleway offers over 100 public cloud products in IaaS, PaaS, and AI.
   

  

 ✔ A cutting-edge technical environment: Scaleway provides modern infrastructures, including high-performance bare metal servers, to tackle exciting technical challenges.
   

  

 ✔ Commitment to responsible cloud: Scaleway is dedicated to a more responsible cloud, with data centers powered solely by renewable energy since 2017, minimizing our ecological footprint and holding top-level certification.
   

  

**🔜 THE NEXT STEPS …**
* Initial conversation with the Talent Acquisition team (30 min)
* Interview with the Business Development Manager to discuss your approach and experience (45 min)
* Business case in English with our Team Lead + Account Executive for the Nordic Region (1h)
* Interview with future team members to assess fit and collaboration potential (45 min)
* Final interview with our CSO, Doreen Pernel (30 min)


*At Scaleway, we are committed to building an inclusive and respectful workplace where everyone has a fair opportunity to thrive.*
*All applications are considered with care, regardless of age, gender, sexual orientation, ethnic or social background, religion, disability, or any other characteristic.*
*We believe great ideas come from everywhere, and everyone which is why you should definitely apply.*

title: Customer Success Executive
description:
**Company Description**
 It all started in sunny San Diego, California in 2004 when a visionary engineer, Fred Luddy, saw the potential to transform how we work. Fast forward to today — ServiceNow stands as a global market leader, bringing innovative AI-enhanced technology to over 8,100 customers, including 85% of the Fortune 500®. Our intelligent cloud-based platform seamlessly connects people, systems, and processes to empower organizations to find smarter, faster, and better ways to work. But this is just the beginning of our journey. Join us as we pursue our purpose to make the world work better for everyone.
   

  

**Job Description**
 The
 **Customer Success Executive** 
 is responsible for providing strategic leadership and driving the execution of post-sales activities across our most strategic accounts in Sweden. This position plays a crucial role in driving ServiceNow’s long-term value by accelerating customers’ journey to success, ensuring predictable renewals, and maximizing the impact of ServiceNow across their business transformation initiatives.
   

  

 As a trusted advisor, you’ll partner with C-level executives, guide seamless delivery of business transformation, and foster collaboration with ServiceNow’s teams and strategic partners.
   

  

**What You Get To Do In This Role**
* Drive Post-Sales Success: Own and lead the customer’s post-sales transformation, aligning ServiceNow’s offerings to customer goals, and bringing relevant industry thought-leadership to the table. Foster strong relationships with C-Level executives to deliver on business outcomes.
* Collaborate Strategically: Partner with Account Executives to create and execute integrated pre- and post-sales strategies, delivering long-term value for both the customer and ServiceNow. Leverage the right resources at the right time to ensure success.
* Mitigate Risks and Drive Value: Proactively identify potential risks to success and work with the customer and internal teams to develop strategies to overcome them, ensuring a smooth path toward value realization.
* Focus on Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): Guide and inspire the Customer Success team to meet critical operational KPIs—adoption, technical health, renewals, customer satisfaction, and expansion. Work closely with customers to align their roadmap and drive new revenue opportunities.
* Foster Strategic Alignment: Build relationships with ServiceNow leaders and consistently incorporate customer feedback to drive continuous improvement. Align business transformation insights with organizational goals to ensure long-term success.
* Advocate for Innovation and Continuous Learning: As a strategic thought leader, drive innovative solutions for our customers, always looking for opportunities to help them achieve their long-term goals. Foster a culture of agility and calculated risk-taking within the team.
* Set Success Metrics and Milestones: Establish clear, measurable success metrics with the customer, and regularly review progress. Refine business transformation plans as needed to ensure milestones are met and value is realized


**Qualifications**
 We are seeking a highly experienced professional with a strong background in
 **enterprise-level SaaS transformation and strategic advisory** 
 to guide our customers in their digital transformation journey. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in technology-enabled business transformations, coupled with a proven ability to advise at the executive level.
   

  

**Key Requirements**
* AI Integration & Thought Leadership: Experience leveraging AI to enhance work processes, decision-making, and problem-solving, including AI-powered automation, workflow optimization, and data-driven insights
* Enterprise SaaS Transformation & Strategic Advisory: Extensive experience leading large-scale digital transformations within SaaS or enterprise software environments.
* C-Level Presence & Relationship Management: Proven ability to engage, influence, and build lasting relationships with senior executives, including within some of the world’s largest enterprises..
* Leadership Expertise: A minimum of 15 years in management consulting, solution consulting, or a leadership role at a top-tier consulting firm, with a strong track record of exceeding business objectives.
* Strategic Account Management: Demonstrated success in leading high-impact customer success or consulting teams and managing complex, strategic accounts.
* Business Acumen & Problem-Solving: Ability to identify, analyze, and solve complex business challenges while aligning technology solutions with customer objectives.
* Cross-Functional Leadership: Strong experience working across multiple departments, driving alignment, and managing stakeholders in large, matrixed organizations.
* Adaptability & Change Management: Ability to navigate dynamic environments, adjusting strategies to meet evolving customer and business needs.
* Operational & Execution Excellence: Skilled at designing and implementing scalable, repeatable processes while maintaining a hands-on approach to drive successful execution.
* Collaboration & Communication: Exceptional ability to communicate complex ideas clearly, foster collaboration across teams, and influence stakeholders at all levels.
* Customer-Centric Mindset: Deep understanding of customer challenges, needs, and motivations, with a focus on delivering value-driven solutions and ensuring long-term success.
* Fluency in English and Swedish is essential
* Right to work in Sweden


 This role is ideal for a
 **seasoned strategic advisor** 
 who thrives in high-impact environments and has the expertise to guide enterprise customers through digital transformation at scale.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

**Work Personas**
 We lead with flexibility and trust in our distributed world of work. Work personas (flexible, remote, or required in office) are categories that are assigned to ServiceNow employees depending on the nature of their work. Learn more here.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 ServiceNow is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin or nationality, ancestry, age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital status, veteran status, or any other category protected by law. In addition, all qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with legal requirements.
   

  

**Accommodations**
 We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates. If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are unable to use this online application and need an alternative method to apply, please contact talent.acquisition@servicenow.com for assistance.
   

  

**Export Control Regulations**
 For positions requiring access to controlled technology subject to export control regulations, including the U.S. Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may be required to obtain export control approval from government authorities for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by relevant export control authorities.
   

  

 From Fortune. ©2024 Fortune Media IP Limited. All rights reserved. Used under license.

title: Account Executive Nordics
description:
**About Us**
 Eagle Eye Networks is the global leader in cloud video surveillance, delivering cyber-secure, cloud-based video with artificial intelligence (AI) and analytics to make businesses more efficient and the world a safer place. The Eagle Eye Cloud VMS (video management system) is the only platform robust and flexible enough to power the future of video surveillance and intelligence. Eagle Eye is based in Austin, Texas, with offices in Amsterdam, Bangalore, and Tokyo.
   

  

 Eagle Eye Networks is a dynamic, fast-moving company. We value the benefits of face-to-face collaboration, and we believe it is more enjoyable and productive. The synergy of in-office interaction is critical to our culture and your presence is essential for Eagle Eye Networks’ success. Eagle Eye Networks has recently announced a return-to-office initiative that requires employees to be in the office five days a week.
   

  

**Summary**
 As an Account Executive, you will be responsible for driving sales by building pipeline, progressing deals, and closing them. You’ll work closely with the partner organization, as all deals are implemented through our partners.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Pipeline Development & Deal Progression:
+ Generate and build a strong sales pipeline through prospecting, lead follow-up, and nurturing existing client relationships.
+ Progress deals from initial contact to final close by understanding client needs, demonstrating value, and providing tailored solutions.

* Closing Deals:
+ Manage the full sales cycle from start to finish, ensuring smooth transitions from the sales team to our partner network for implementation.
+ Negotiate contracts, handle objections, and close deals with end-users ranging from SMBs to large enterprises based on your experience level.

* Collaboration with Partner Network:
+ Work hand-in-hand with our partner organization to ensure all sales deals are seamlessly transitioned for implementation.
+ Build and maintain strong relationships with both clients and partners to foster long-term business success.

* Client Engagement:
+ Serve as a trusted advisor for clients by understanding their business needs and proposing relevant Eagle Eye Networks solutions.
+ Engage with end-user clients of various sizes, including small businesses, mid-market, and enterprise-level organizations, depending on your experience and skills.


**Experience**
* Education:
+ Minimum requirement of a Bachelor's degree.

* Experience Level
+ Mid-Level & Senior-Level: Minimum of 5 - 6 years of experience. Experienced sales professionals will handle more complex deals, targeting mid-market and enterprise-level clients based on years of successful experience.

* Skills:
+ Proven ability to build, manage, and close a sales pipeline.
+ Excellent communication and negotiation skills, with the ability to influence decision-makers across various industries.
+ A strong collaborative mindset to work effectively with partners to ensure successful deal implementation.
+ Self-starter with a results-driven attitude and a passion for technology sales.


 More About Eagle Eye Networks
   

  

 Eagle Eye Networks is leveraging artificial intelligence on its true cloud platform to dramatically reshape the video surveillance and security industry. The Eagle Eye Cloud Video Management System (VMS) is a smart cloud video surveillance solution, purpose-built to help businesses improve safety, security, operations, and customer service. Tens of thousands of companies in more than 90 countries around the globe have moved their video surveillance to the cloud with Eagle Eye VMS. Customers, including multi-family residences, smart cities, schools, hospitals, hotels, logistics, restaurants, and retail shops trust Eagle Eye for actionable business intelligence and proactive security across multiple locations. The Eagle Eye VMS has strong APIs for the secure integration of third-party systems and works with thousands of industry cameras, so customers don’t have to “rip and replace” their existing infrastructure. Eagle Eye Cloud VMS is the only platform robust enough to power the future of video surveillance.
   

  

 Eagle Eye Networks is an equal employment opportunity employer and values diversity. Qualified candidates are considered for employment without regard to race, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, military or veteran status, disability, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.

title: Channel Sales Manager Europe
description:
**The Company** 




 Sunway Communication is a world leader in the design and manufacturing of key components and modules for the consumer electronics, wireless IoT, automotive and telecom markets. Antennas, RF modules, wireless chargers, EMI/EMC shields, cables/connectors, passive components, electromechanical modules and other performance-critical solutions help our customers to gain competitive edge. Our components and modules are developed with, and supplied directly to, essentially all global top brands in the communication market. Our design offices are found in the US, Europe and across Asia supported by production locations in China, Vietnam and Mexico.
 



 Sunway already has a global footprint as a tier-one supplier to global leaders in its core markets, and now we are strengthening our focus on the European market. Sunway has a well-established global footprint and is headquartered and listed on the stock exchange in the high-tech center Shenzhen. Group revenues are around 1.2 BUSD.
 



 In Europe, we have an office in Sweden with dedicated professionals offering our RF, electromechanical and mechanical products to European customers as well as conducting research and development in collaboration with colleagues from our other research centers. Our Stockholm office features a fully equipped laboratory for RF and antenna testing including a 3D anechoic chamber as well as state of the art simulation and design software capabilities.
 



  





**The Role** 




 As Channel Sales Manager Europe your main responsibilities will be to develop both global and regional channel partners and drive sales through these channels. A major new product line for this sales channel is MLCCs (multilayer ceramic capacitors), where Sunway in 2023 officially inaugurated a greenfield factory with state-of-the-art manufacturing equipment to service the global market as a major future player. Other standard and customized products are expected to also play a big role in sales contribution. Our industry focus is the IoT, industrial, automotive and consumer electronics markets. You will report to the Vice President Europe, based in Stockholm.
 



  





**Your Profile** 




 We expect that you have solid experience of sales and development of channel sales and ideally product experience from passive components as well as our other relevant products. You are an ambitious and self-propelling individual with a network to help us develop the channel business substantially. We expect you to communicate fluently in English, and other major European business languages are a merit. You comfortably interface with colleagues in Europe, China, and the US since many projects are global in nature.
 



  





**What we Offer** 




 Although we are a large company, we have an entrepreneurial mindset instilled from the onset by our founder, who is still the largest owner. This is noticed particularly in our European organization, where we have a dynamic and fluid working environment. We have a high degree of freedom for own initatives and give you the ability to make a major difference to our company. Our decision paths are short, since we see our speed and flexibility as a major competitive edge. In Sunway, you have the opportunity to work with a wide spectrum of companies and technologies in a global environment.
 



  





 Your preferred office location will be Stockholm, Sweden, but home office in Europe can also be considered.

title: AWS Software Engineer
description:
Brinner du för att koda, upptäcka nya tekniker och samtidigt ha kul på jobbet tillsammans med dina härliga kollegor? Då har vi på Capgemini otroliga möjligheter för dig! Kom och bli en del av vårt AWS Team där vi kombinerar passion för mjukvaruutveckling med en varm, snäll, utvecklande och välkomnande arbetsmiljö.
   

  

 Vi hjälper våra kunder, samhället och våra anställda att tillsammans skapa en bättre framtid inom affärs- och tekniktransformation till en digital och mer hållbar värld. Redo att #GetTheFutureYouWant? Hos oss får du chansen att forma din framtida karriär! Vi letar efter nya kollegor som AWS Software Engineer till både
 **Stockholm** 
 ,
 **Göteborg** 
 och
 **Malmö.**
 Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa och mångsidiga projekt som använder de senaste AWS-teknologierna, GenAI, AI och moderna frameworks. Vi arbetar med Amazon Q, AWS SageMaker och skapar roliga lösningar. Vårt team arbetar bland annat med Amazon Q eller GitHub Copilot, och vi levererar lösningar med Amazon SageMaker, Microsoft Copilot Studio, och AWS Bedrock. Vi erbjuder oändliga möjligheter för lärande och utveckling för att ta din karriär till nya höjder, med karriärvägar för arkitekter, tech leads, juniorer, gurus och alla däremellan. #GetTheFutureYouWant. Du blir en del av en vänlig och inkluderande miljö som firar mångfald och främjar samarbete. Dessutom erbjuder vi flexibla arbetstider som främjar en hälsosam balans mellan arbete och fritid.
   

  

**Om rollen**
* Utveckla mjukvarulösningar.
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team med agil metodik för att producera förstklassig mjukvara.
* Implementera bästa praxis för molnarkitektur och säkerhet.
* Lära sig nya tekniker inom mjukvara, molnlösningar och GenAI.


**Din profil**
* Arbetslivserfarenhet med molntjänster, exempelvis AWS eller GCP.
* Erfarenhet inom programmeringsspråk som Java, Python, Kotlin, Golang eller Node.js.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska då båda språken används i det dagliga arbetet.


**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**
 Hos oss på Capgemini tror vi på en positiv och professionell inställning, att dela kunskap och att investera i varje medarbetares utbildning och kompetensutveckling för att hjälpa alla att växa. Hos oss kan du därför Get TheFfuture You Want! Samtidigt värdesätter vi såklart att ha KUL på jobbet. En dag spelar vi pingis på rasten, en annan dag kör vi en omgång Mario Cart eller fikar tillsammans. Vi har även mentorsprogram samt engagerar oss i kvinnliga Tech nätverk, som exempelvis #Addher. Varje fredag njuter vi såklart även av vår lyxiga fredagsfrukost! Då vill man inte jobba hemifrån (vilket du kan göra en annan dag under veckan)!
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Redo att ta din karriär till nästa nivå? Ansök nu och bli en del av Capgemini Sveriges innovativa AWS-team! Ansök redan idag – vi hanterar ansökningarna löpande. Under processen får du chansen att kika in på vårt kontor, prata med vår rekryterande chef och självklart ställa alla dina nyfikna frågor till vår rekryterare. Varmt välkommen in med din ansökan!
   

  

*Observera att identitets- och bakgrundskontroller kan genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.*
**Om Capgemini**
 Hos våra kunder arbetar vi i leveranser som kan ha bland annat AWS, GCP, Azure, AliCloud, Java, Go/Golang, Python, Kotlin, Node, HTML, TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, Java, CloudFormation, Terraform, Docker, Kafka, React, Angular, Vue, Bash, Spring, GenAI, GraphQL, Backstage, Kubernetes, LLM, RAG, Copilot, GitHub Actions, SonarQube, BlackDuck, Apache Beam, Kong, Jenkins, Apigee, OpenShift, Ansible, DevSecOps, cloud architecture, cloud assessments, integration, Snowflake, Elastic Search, Grafana, Kibana, Splunk, Databricks, HelmChart, CloudFoundry.
   

  

 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda övergången till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, generativ AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2024 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,1 miljarder euro.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
We’re looking for a sharp
 **Customer Success Manager (CSM)** 
 to take full ownership of driving adoption, retention, and success across a portfolio of our existing customers — mid-sized to large companies with 100–2000 employees. This role is about ensuring customers realize maximum value from Upsales, building deep relationships, and securing long-term partnerships.
   

  

 As a CSM, you’ll work hand-in-hand with our Account Executives — who focus on strategic growth — while you lead the success, health, and day-to-day management of accounts. Your mission: protect and grow Net Revenue Retention (NRR) by ensuring customers renew, expand their usage, and view Upsales as a trusted partner in achieving their business goals.
   

  

 You’ll be responsible for the
 **customer success lifecycle** 
 : onboarding, product adoption, renewals, quarterly business reviews usage health, and acting as the customer’s voice inside Upsales. You’ll anticipate risks before they become churn, help clients unlock more value from our platform, and ensure they always feel supported by world-class delivery and service.
   

  

 This is a role for someone who thrives on
 **relationship-building and problem-solving** 
 . You’ll work closely with champions and power users inside our customer organizations, helping them translate business challenges into solutions powered by Upsales. While AEs own executive-level growth conversations, you’ll be the trusted day-to-day advisor who keeps everything on track and ensures customers succeed at every level.
   

  

 You won’t be alone — you’ll collaborate with our solution engineers and top-rated support team to make sure customers get the expertise they need, when they need it. Together, you’ll form part of the most effective customer success and sales team in the Nordics.
   

  

 Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world… are the ones who do
   

  

**Who We're Looking For**
 This isn’t an entry-level role — we’re looking for someone who has already proven they can deliver customer success at the highest level. You have at least 5 years of experience in customer success, technical sales, account management, or enterprise SaaS delivery, working with mid-market or enterprise customers. You know how to drive adoption, prevent churn, and secure renewals — and you’ve done it consistently, with a strong track record to prove it.
   

  

 You’re skilled at managing multiple stakeholders, from day-to-day champions and power users to senior sponsors, and you know how to build trust across all levels. You bring sharp business acumen, deep technical and product expertise to every conversation, translating customer needs into insights and feedback that shape both strategy and product development. You know how to do run QBR:s, usage reviews, and success plans that deliver measurable impact for customers.
   

  

 Personality-wise? You’re customer-obsessed, proactive, and collaborative. You take pride in helping customers succeed, but you’re also the kind of teammate who jumps in to solve problems before they escalate. You raise the bar, and bring others with you.
   

  

 Upsales is a bootstrapped company with big ambitions, known for our high-performing team, relentless curiosity, and a culture that challenges conventional thinking. From product to sales, we’re obsessed with creating real value for our customers and building software that actually moves the needle.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
**Google Cloud Journey as a Senior Data Scientist at Codento** 




 Do you want to be among the best of Google Cloud technology and be an integral part of growing new business in Sweden, as well as our Nordic growth journey? Do you thrive in an empathetic, low-hierarchical, self-directed, and entrepreneurial work environment? If so, Codento might have the perfect opportunity for you!
 



 At Codento, we are dedicated to delivering exceptional value to customers across diverse industries through the power of cloud technology, software solutions, and AI.
 



 Google Cloud stands out as the fastest-growing cloud platform, and the demand for expertise in this domain is soaring. As our Swedish team expands, we're on the lookout for a talented Senior Data Scientist to tackle complex consulting projects.
 



  

  





**Your tasks during our growth journey:** 




 As a Senior Data Scientist at Codento, you work in responsible consultant positions by planning and utilizing the opportunities brought by cloud technologies to help our customers.
 



 This means you’ll be challenged with different problems within the AI and Cloud landscape, which you solve with the help of other Codento experts.
 



 You work with cloud technology tools that deepen and expand your already possessed know-how. You will learn a lot, especially about Google Cloud, and that is also expected of you in this position.
 







 You will also be working closely with our friends at Google Cloud as well as our Codento Nordic teams.
   









 Read the next section to learn what this means technology-wise.
 



  

  





**When you join us, we expect you to have:** 




**Must-haves** 



* Strong proficiency in Python and SQL
* Machine learning and understanding the whole data science flow
* Data handling and integrations know-how
* Cloud and deployments skills (preferably in Google Cloud)
* Skills in data visualization
* Good skills in working with different stakeholders and a desire to understand the customer’s business
* Excellent communication skills



**Nice-to-haves** 



* Having a strong understanding of the consulting/service business
* Track record of leading projects/teams
* Data warehouse and vector database experience
* MLOps know-how
* Valid GCP Certification
* Growth / entrepreneurial mindset
* Swedish language proficiency



  

  





**Why should you choose Codento?** 








 We provide a vibrant and exciting work environment where you can grow and boost your personal development by using cutting-edge technologies while working on helping our customers solve complex business challenges. We have a small but growing enthusiastic team located in the city of Stockholm.
   









 What we expect from everyone (our values):
   




* Pioneering: The ability to confidently navigate change and a strong hunger for learning new skills.
* Perseverance: Determination and a shared commitment to achieving our common objectives.
* Empathy: The capacity to empathize and collaborate effectively with others.



 When you join Codento, you join a brilliant team of technology experts who are also welcoming and empathetic.
 



  

  





**Interested? Wondering about something?** 




 Apply via the link to our recruitment system! The form is easy and quick to fill. At least leave either your CV or/and LinkedIn profile and answer the multiple choice questions. You can also write a short cover letter if you want.
 



 If you want to know more about us, please visit our website. There you will find many customer cases and blogs from which you can reflect on whether we’re a good fit for you. :)

title: People Manager Customer Service Delivery within eHealth
description:
Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions supports health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.
   

  

**The position**
 As a
 **People Manager** 
**at Cambio** 
 , you are responsible for the internal and customer-facing deliveries. You will support the way of working for the area, tools, and to secure effective governance to secure high-quality and efficient deliveries from your team. You will lead a team of approximately 15 skilled professionals within service delivery. You will also support and develop your team members, foster a collaborative and trusting work environment, and help them reach their full potential. You will have full people responsibility, including coaching, goal setting, performance development, and building a healthy and engaging team culture.
   

  

 You will play a key role in enabling effective service deliveries. Working closely with other leaders in the delivery organization, you’ll collaborate to ensure alignment, operational excellence, and continuous improvement across teams.
   

  

**Your Key Responsibilities**
* Lead, coach, and support your team members in their daily work and long-term development
* Build a strong and inclusive team culture based on trust, collaboration, and continuous learning
* Set clear expectations and follow up on goals and performance
* Support the team in delivering high-quality services to our customers
* Drive improvements in ways of working and team efficiency
* Collaborate closely with fellow managers to ensure alignment across the organization


**We Offer**
 You will lead a skilled team with a broad range of expertise within the Service Delivery area. They are driven and self-motivated. You will collaborate with several other passionate and supportive managers within the division. This is a place where you can grow as a leader in a dynamic and friendly environment, where no two days are the same. Cambio’s leadership program provides a strong foundation for developing your leadership skills together with other leaders across the company.
   

  

**About You**
 You will lead a skilled team with a broad range of expertise within the Service Delivery area. They are driven and self-motivated. You will collaborate with several other passionate and supportive managers within the division. This is a place where you can grow as a leader in a dynamic and friendly environment, where no two days are the same. Cambio’s leadership program provides a strong foundation for developing your leadership skills together with other leaders across the company.
   

  

 At Cambio, we value initiative and personal growth. Our culture is built on Trust, Care, and Together values we believe are important to both our work and our people. It’s important to us that you recognize and identify with these values.
   

  

**Requirements** 
  

  

* Proven experience as a people leader, including team development and performance management
* Experience with change management and driving improvements
* Background in IT, tech, or service-focused organizations
* Excellent communication skills in both Swedish and English


**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm or Linköping
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

 We review applications and conduct interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible via the link. However, during the summer holiday period we'll be off and therefore we'll get back to you in August.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
**CAMBIO- FOR A HEALTHIER TOMORROW**
 Welcome to a company where healthcare is improved every day. Here you will work with leading technology in a collaborative, trusting and empowering environment where your contribution will be appreciated and celebrated. In our caring culture you will have the opportunity to pursue different paths of professional growth. Seize the opportunity to do the most important work of your life
 **.** 
 Read more about us
 **here!**
**A healthier tomorrow also means taking care of those who make it possible** 
**-** 
 explore our employee benefits
   

  

 Learn more about our recruitment process here.
   

  

 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at our career site.
   

  

 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Senior Sales Manager
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Senior Regional Sales Manager - Nordics** 




**Sweden, Denmark, or Finland** 




 c€170 OTE
 



  





**Company Overview** 




 Client is a Telecoms company, headquartered in England, It is organised into three operating segments – Networks & Security, Lifecycle Service Assurance and Connected Devices.
 



 The company provides a world class, innovative portfolio of products and services that addresses the test, assurance, and automation challenges of a new generation of technologies: 5G, SD-WAN, Cloud and Autonomous Vehicles
 



  





**Job Overview** 




 Lead and develop clients footprint in test, assurance, and service assurance across the Nordics and Baltics region. The role is managing a large existing account as well as focussing on Service Provider, NEM and Financial Services sectors.
 







**Job Responsibilities** 




 • Create and execute a Nordics/Baltics territory strategy building on existing footprint and momentum, working closely with channel teams, Sales System Engineering resource and the EMEA Technical Office.
 



 • Identify strategic targets, both in existing and new accounts.
 



 • Interfaces with both internal and external industry experts to anticipate client needs, drive industry mindshare, and facilitate solution development.
 



  





**Job Requirements** 




 • Minimum of 10-15 years of experience in sales in the communications or technology industry with solution selling and service sales experience.
 



 • Strong hunter mentality with demonstrable track record of high sales growth/attainment.
 



 • Sound understanding of the communications, network assurance, or related industries.
 



 • Solid network of strong connections/relationships with Service Provider/Network Equipment Manufacturer and Financial Services customers at a senior decision maker level in the Nordics/Baltics region.
 



 • Ability to travel up to 50% of the time as required.

title: Adtech Solution Specialist
description:
Vill du vara med och utforska hur annonsteknik kan driva utvecklingen av digitala videoprodukter och nya affärsmöjligheter? Vill du arbeta med ett hängivet team som målmedvetet strävar mot att leverera goda resultat varje dag? Är du redo att anta utmaningen och tillsammans med skickliga kollegor transformera TV4 för framtidens medielandskap och kommersiella möjligheter?
   

  

 Känner du igen dig i beskrivningen ovan? Nu finns en fantastisk möjlighet att få jobba i Adtech-teamet på TV4. Adtech-teamet ingår i specialistenheten Advanced Advertising vars primära uppdrag är att driva en hållbar övergång till en digitalt reklamfinansierad affärsmodell. Oavsett om det gäller linjär tv eller streaming så berörs och täcks alla komponenter i kedjan för att skapa en modern och effektiv försäljningsorganisation med framtidssäkrade konkurrenskraftiga produkter. Vi designar, kravställer, beställer och förhandlar i hela värdekedjan – från self-service-verktyg och CRM-system till ssp och adservers. Vi verkar som en brygga med att översätta marknadens föränderliga behov till framtidssäkrade lösningar tillsammans med våra kollegor inom Product Tech & Operations och externa leverantörer. Adtech-teamet jobbar med samtliga delar av försäljningsavdelningen och stora delar av organisationen som utgör TV4 och MTV inom affärsenheten TV Media.
   

  

**Arbetsbeskrivning** 
 :
   

  

 Vi söker nu en Adtech Solution Specialist. Du kommer ingå i en nordisk specialistorganisation som driver transformation för både TV4 i Sverige och MTV i Finland. Du rapporter till Chef Adtech och ingår i Adtech-teamet där det är högt i tak och där vi respekterar och drar fördel av varandras olika styrkor och synsätt. Vår operativa modell bygger på att skapa förutsättningar för respektive medarbetare att få jobba mest med det man är bäst på eller tycker är mest utvecklande. I rollen är det en stor fördel att ha intresse och förståelse för hur vår digitala affär fungerar och hur tekniska lösningar kan bidra till utveckling. I Adtech-teamet säkerställer vi att alla tekniska förutsättningar finns på plats för att såväl våra produkter som organisationens medarbetare ska ha bästa möjlighet att leverera på sina mål. Du kommer att tolka behoven från produktspecialister, säljare, försäljningschefer, adplanners och administratörer, och omsätta dessa till direkta lösningar eller beställningar till interna och externa leverantörer. Du kommer också konsekvent att medverka i prioritering av utveckling av de system som stöttar vår digitala affär där kontinuerlig felsökning och rapportering utgör en viktig del av arbetet.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**
* Kravställa och lösa utmaningar i befintliga eller nya system som direkt eller indirekt påverkar vår reklamaffär med primärt fokus på det digitala.
* Kontinuerligt planera/genomföra/följa upp tester av våra system och/eller lösningar samt kopplingarna där emellan, i syfte att identifiera diskrepanser och/eller oönskad effekt samt outnyttjad potential.
* Samla in, analysera och dra slutsatser av komplex data för att stödja organisationen i att ständigt utveckla och förbättra reklamaffären
* Kravställa, bidra och engagera i utbildningsfrågor och driva ”thought leadership” digitalt
* Bidra i strategiskt arbete kring vår annonsteknik för att framtidssäkra den digitala utvecklingen av reklamaffären
* Verka som en intraprenör och brygga mellan säljarens/marknadens behov och teknikavdelningen och/eller externa leverantörers tekniska lösningar
* Operativt arbete i digitala annonsteknik- och säljstödsystem kring felsökning, rapportering och löpande rekommendationer till förbättringar


**Personliga kvalifikationer:**
 För att lyckas i rollen som Adtech Solution Specialist så måste du ha ett starkt intresse för utveckling av TV4’s digitala produkter. Vidare bör du ha tidigare erfarenhet av och goda kunskaper om digital annonsteknik (adserving/programmatic) där digital video är extra meriterande. Du är analytisk, initiativrik och nyfiken med goda egenskaper i att operativt arbeta med data, presentationsmaterial och pedagogisk kommunikation. Erfarenhet av roller i försäljningsorganisationer inom media med inriktning mot digitala produkter och säljsystem ser vi som meriterande.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder:**
* En dynamisk och stimulerande arbetsmiljö i fräscha lokaler och med kollegor, minst lika ambitiösa som du själv
* Möjlighet till personlig kompetensutveckling samt goda karriärmöjligheter inom koncernen
* Ett positivt, utmanande och stimulerande arbete i Sveriges mest konkurrenskraftiga mediehus


**Praktiskt**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid och inleds med sex månaders provanställning. Tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm med gångavstånd till Gärdets tunnelbana. Vi har eget gym, parkeringsgarage samt restaurang i huset.
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag är
 ***2025-09-07***
 . Urval och intervjuer sker löpande så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan!
   

  

 Har du ytterligare frågor om tjänsten, välkommen att kontakta
 ***Gabriel Ashman, Chef Adtech***
 via
 ***gabriel.ashman@tv4.se.***
 Tjänsten ingår i
 ***Unionens***
 avtalsområde och fackliga frågor besvaras via mejl till
 ***unionen@tv4.se***
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: AI Solutions architect
description:
**Location:** 
 EMEA
   

  

**Job Description**
 As an AI/ML Solution Architect, you will be responsible for designing and overseeing the architecture of AI and machine learning solutions. You will work closely with data scientists, engineers, and business stakeholders to ensure that our AI/ML initiatives are scalable, robust, and aligned with business objectives. Your expertise in machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing (NLP), and generative AI will be crucial in guiding the development and deployment of advanced AI solutions.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Include**
* Design and architect end-to-end AI/ML solutions that meet business requirements and technical specifications.
* Develop and implement scalable machine learning and deep learning models, ensuring they integrate seamlessly into existing systems.
* Create architectures for NLP applications, including text processing, sentiment analysis, named entity recognition, and language modelling.
* Leverage generative AI and large language models (LLMs) to develop innovative applications.
* Collaborate with data engineers to design data pipelines and ensure data quality and accessibility.
* Provide technical leadership and guidance to data scientists and engineers throughout the development lifecycle.
* Evaluate and select appropriate AI/ML tools, frameworks, and technologies to meet project needs.
* Ensure best practices in AI/ML model development, including versioning, testing, and validation.
* Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI/ML technologies and incorporate them into architectural designs.
* Communicate complex AI/ML concepts and solutions effectively to non-technical stakeholders.


**About GIT**
 Group IT is an internal Capgemini function that delivers a comprehensive portfolio of technology services to the entire Capgemini Group. We look after more than 360,000 employees in countries and continents across the world, around the clock. We work with a wide variety of business lines, each requiring specific IT solutions and support. With people from a diverse range of cultures, all collaborating to achieve a common set of goals.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience (8+ years) in designing and implementing AI/ML solutions, with a strong focus on machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and generative AI.
* Extensive experience with machine learning algorithms, model development, and deployment.
* Proficiency in deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras.
* Strong expertise in NLP techniques and tools, including experience with LLMs like Gemini, GPT, BERT, etc.
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and their AI/ML services.
* Knowledge of big data technologies and tools such as Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, and Java.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to design robust, scalable AI/ML architectures.
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to present technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Experience in leading and mentoring technical teams.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with MLOps practices and tools for continuous integration and deployment of machine learning models.
* Familiarity with data visualization tools such as Looker, Tableau, Power BI, or similar.


**Capgemini Text (obligatory)**
 When you join Capgemini, you don’t just start a new job, you become a part of something bigger.
   

  

 Capgemini’s purpose is to “unleash human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future”. Established in 1967 and now headquartered in Paris, we have become one of the largest technology consulting firms providing services to government, the environment, retail, health, manufacturing and aerospace. We live by our brand values: honesty, boldness, trust, freedom, fun, modesty and team spirit.
   

  

**GET THE FUTURE YOU WANT**

title: Data Platform Architect
description:
**About Us**
 The Capgemini Group is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their businesses. We do this through unleashing human energy, imagination and ingenuity by harnessing the power of technology. By doing so we aim to achieve an inclusive and sustainable future. We are a responsible and diverse organization of nearly 336,000+ people. We have a presence in over 50 countries. Our rich 57-year heritage and deep industry expertise means that our clients trust us to address the entire breadth of their business needs. We provide strategy, design, operations and more, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms.
   

  

**Group IT**
 Group IT delivers a comprehensive portfolio of technology services to one client: the Capgemini Group. We look after close to 336,000+ Capgemini employees in over 50 countries around the world, 24/7. We work with a huge variety of business lines, each requiring specific IT solutions and support and with people from diverse cultures, all collaborating with a common set of goals.
   

  

 As a strategic partner, Group IT is committed to enabling business success, delivering innovative, human-centric solutions that inspire our people and their customers. With 4,000 employees, Group IT plays a major role in enabling all of the Capgemini Group’s employees, in 50+ countries around the world, to work productively, every day. Access to these diverse geographies, cultures and demands – serviced with innovative technologies – makes Group IT an exciting and rewarding place to work.
   

  

 In support of the Capgemini Group and Group IT’s related goals and ambitions, Group IT is currently engaged in several major transformation programs. These programs represent an exciting opportunity to be involved in positioning and preparing Group IT – and Capgemini itself – to take on the challenges of the immediate future and the years ahead.
   

  

 A career in Group IT is truly a unique opportunity: to make the most of your skills; learn and grow as part of a world-leading technology organization and collaborate with other talented colleagues to succeed in a constantly evolving environment. Those who join our transformation programs will contribute to the future of Group IT and of Capgemini in a very real sense.
   

  

**Job Description**
 The Data Platform Architect will be responsible for the end-to-end design, development, and management of scalable and secure data platforms. This role includes handling end-to-end platform solutions, from infrastructure design to data security and deployment.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* End-to-End Platform Solutions:
* Design, implement, and manage the entire lifecycle of the data platform, from infrastructure setup to the deployment of data services.
* Ensure that the platform meets business requirements and is scalable, secure, and cost-effective, providing an end-to-end solution for enterprise-wide data management needs.
* Oversee platform integration with enterprise applications, tools, and services while ensuring a seamless user experience.
* Platform Strategy & Architecture:
* Architect a robust and scalable data platform that supports data lakes, data warehouses, and real-time analytics solutions.
* Leverage Terraform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to automate infrastructure deployment and management processes.
* Align platform architecture with the overall enterprise data strategy and ensure it supports current and future data needs.
* Security & Landing Zone Implementation:
* Lead the implementation of data security best practices, including data encryption, access control, and auditing across the platform.
* Design and deploy secure landing zones in cloud environments (GCP, Azure) to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and safeguard sensitive data.
* Implement security controls that monitor and protect data assets across both cloud and on-premise environments.
* Performance Optimization & Scalability:
* Monitor and enhance the performance and scalability of the data platform, ensuring minimal downtime and optimized resource utilization.
* Utilize Terraform scripting to automate infrastructure management and deployment, ensuring scalability and agility.
* Design and manage efficient data pipelines for large-scale datasets, focusing on batch and real-time data processing.
* Networking & Data Security:
* Use fundamental networking skills to ensure secure and reliable data communication across on-premise and cloud environments.
* Implement security mechanisms such as encryption, network isolation, and access controls to protect data throughout its lifecycle.
* Collaborate with security teams to ensure data platform complies with governance policies and industry regulations.


**Qualifications**
* 8+ years of experience in data architecture, platform engineering, or related fields, with a strong focus on designing and managing end-to-end platform solutions.
* Proven expertise in Terraform scripting, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and cloud-based platforms (GCP, Azure).
* Solid experience in DevOps fundamentals and CI/CD pipeline implementation.
* Strong understanding of fundamental networking concepts (e.g., TCP/IP, DNS, VPNs, firewalls) for secure data transmission.


**Technical Skills**
* Expertise in Terraform scripting for automating infrastructure management.
* Strong knowledge of cloud platforms and services (e.g., GCP, Azure) and data technologies like Snowflake, Databricks, and Hadoop.
* Proficiency in DevOps tools such as Jenkins, Kubernetes, Docker, and CI/CD frameworks.
* In-depth understanding of data security best practices, including encryption, access control, and regulatory compliance.
* Experience designing and implementing secure landing zones for cloud platforms.


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training, a global network of experts and an innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success.
* Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.
* A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, Fun, and Boldness.
* A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.


**Application**
 In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis. As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.
   

  

**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries.
   

  

 With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want** 
 | www.capgemini.com

title: SAP Architect
description:

 Our SAP Delivery Center aims to build strong and sustainable solutions for customers across Europe. We are looking for

 to join the team to build, support, and drive customer innovations—bringing efficiency to processes through effective management of cost and schedule. If you want to grow and build the foundation on the
