title: Digital Trust and Cyber Security Management Consultant, Sweden (hiring to multiple levels)
description:
**Now hiring: Key roles in our growing Swedish cyber security team**
 At Capgemini Invent, we’re on a mission to build the leading Digital Trust & Cyber Security management consulting team in Sweden to be part of our existing Nordic team already established in Finland and Denmark. With major market opportunities on the horizon and the strength of our Nordic and global teams behind us, we’re assembling a powerhouse of entrepreneurial minds ready to take cyber security to the next level. Cyber security has never been more critical—or more exciting. We are looking for driven, entrepreneurial people who are ready to shape the future of cyber with us. If you’re passionate about cyber security and ready to help us build and lead, we want to talk to you.
   

  

**We Are Actively Recruiting To The Following Roles/levels**
 Senior consultants
   

  

 Manager
   

  

 Senior Manager/Team Lead
   

  

 If you are passionate about building secure digital futures for clients and thrive at the intersection of strategy and execution, then we invite you to lead the way as one of our founding members of our Swedish Digital Trust & Security team.
   

  

**Your role**
 At Capgemini Invent we empower businesses to navigate the ever-evolving landscape of digital transformation. As a leading management consultancy, we help clients embrace new technologies while safeguarding their critical data and assets.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities Include**
* Design, develop, and implement cutting-edge cyber and data protection strategies and cybersecurity operating models.
* Conduct performance improvement assessments and benchmarking clients' security posture against national and international standards.
* Develop robust governance, risk, and compliance frameworks, incorporating both traditional and innovative approaches.
* Guide clients through business resilience transformations, ensuring they are prepared for any crisis or disruption.
* Working aligned with leading cybersecurity management platforms & technologies.
* Champion the integration of Digital Trust & Security into cloud and digital workplace initiatives.
* Manage and collaborate closely with our Nordic Digital Trust & Security teams.


**Your profile**
 We are driven by a shared purpose: Unleashing human energy through technology, data, creative and innovation for an inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  

 The person we want to invite to join our mission will likely have:
   

  

* Management consulting experience and proven experience in leading digital transformation projects focused on information security, data protection, or cybersecurity, and the application of cybertechnology.
* Passion for combining strategic thinking with hands-on implementation.
* High integrity, collaborative spirit, and a strong fit with our dynamic culture.
* Excellent presentation and facilitation skills.
* Familiarity with current cybersecurity management standards (ISO 2700x, NIST) is advantageous.
* Relevant certifications (ISO 2700x, CISM, CISA, CISSP) and experience with legal and regulatory requirements (EU-GDPR, NIS2) are a strong plus.
* Previous management experience, leading teams in information security, data protection, and/or cybersecurity, with a proactive approach to identifying strategic improvement areas for clients.
* Experience on sales, pre-sales, offering.
* Educational background of relevance in cybersecurity , technology, or IT.
* Swedish citizenship, fluency in Swedish and English.


**What We Offer**
* The opportunity to shape the future of a leading management consultancy practice.
* Collaborate with a team of passionate and talented professionals.
* Make a real difference for our clients, helping them thrive in today’s digital world.
* Build a rewarding career with a company that invests in your growth and development.


**Sounds like the next step in your career?**
 We know that some might hesitate to apply unless they meet every single requirement. If that sounds familiar, we encourage you to apply anyway. You might be a better fit than you think—and we’d love to hear from you. We review applications on an ongoing basis and encourage you to apply as soon as possible! Please submit your application and CV in English.
   

  

**Please note:** 
 As part of our recruitment process, all candidates will be required to present valid identification for verification during the initial interview.

title: Test Manager
description:
**Join our Team**
**About This Opportunity**
 Grow your career with us! If you are interested in test, strategies, and a challenging technical leadership career, you've come to the right place. Product Engineering Group RAN Performance, PEU-RP, is a unit at Ericsson which is at the forefront of 5G development, including application of innovative technologies such as Cloud and Artificial Intelligence.
   

  

 As a Test Manager in PEU-RP you will as a technical leader drive and define test analysis of new 5G RAN features, for both Purpose built and Cloud RAN deployments, to secure the most efficient and effective test coverage, which ensures product quality and an optimized product flow. Additionally, you will continuously optimize legacy test coverage using several methods for an appropriate risk level. In this context, you will work closely with a wide network including other technical leaders, program organization, product owners, Systems/Design/Test/Customer Support teams etc., and play an active role in inspiring and educating the test community on test strategies and test practices, to secure all the assigned test activities across product test flow are within approved cost, time, and quality frame.
   

  

 We emphasize team work, communication and co-operation. We expect you to be a strong team player and thereby contribute to the teams’ successes. We expect you to be willing to step forward and take responsibility and actively drive issues as well as taking part in all aspects of the Test Manager role. We also expect you to live by Ericsson core values professionalism, respect, perseverance and integrity. We provide an open working climate and diversity where all opinions and contributions are appreciated as well as a possibility to work with the latest technology telecommunication development.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Drive Test Analysis work of 5G RAN features and products during study and development phases to set and communicate test scope on all levels
* Support development teams to follow and adhere to test strategies to ensure timely and cost efficient test
* Identify test tools impact and/or risks for new features and products and follow up the implementation
* Identify and forecast test environment requirements
* Secure that detailed test scope is performed during the execution phase to ensure test coverage and quality
* Contribute to test strategies and new test methodologies to enhance test efficiency
* Educate and support the organization on test strategy and efficient testing


**The skills you bring:**
* University education M.Sc/B.Sc in Computer science/Telecommunication/Electrical engineering or equivalent experience
* Minimum 8 years of experience in 5G RAN development or deployment (e.g., from Systems, Design, Feature Verification, System Verification, CI/CD or Customer Support)
* Good understanding of software development and testing processes, including Agile and Waterfall methodologies
* Ability to communicate effectively in written and verbal English
* Strong problem solving skills to devise innovative solutions for testing challenges and analytical abilities to troubleshoot complex issues
* Ability to articulate and convey complex technical information effectively to stakeholders
* Ability to lead a group of people and inspire and mentor testing teams
* Ability to handle changing requirements and project scopes with a flexible mindset
* Advantages for this position: Experience from Test Strategy work, Knowledge in AI and Machine Learning in test, Data driven test management, Next generation software development


 We look forward to your application with CV in English. We target 60% work-from-the office.
   

  

 Last day to apply is 9th of September 2025. Please note that we do not accept, proceed, or respond for applications sent via e-mail.
   

  

 If you have specific questions, you are welcome to contact Muhammad Usman, Manager of Test Management, at muhammad.usman@ericsson.com or Madalina Dinu, Sr. Talent Acquisition Partner at Madalina.a.dinu@ericsson.com
   

  

**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 770153

title: Lösningsarkitekt
description:
*Att välja Capgemini innebär att välja ett företag där du får möjlighet att forma din karriär på det sätt du önskar. Här kommer att få stöd och inspiration inom en samarbetsvillig gemenskap med kollegor både lokalt och runt om i världen, som ständigt omdefinierar vad som är möjligt. Du kommer att vara en del av området Cloud and Custom Application (C&CA) på Capgemini. Här kommer du att arbeta med de senaste teknologierna inom Cloud, Integration, AI och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi utvecklar skräddarsydda applikationer och hanterar komplexa integrationer för att maximera teknikens potential. Följ med oss och samarbeta med världens ledande organisationer för att realisera teknikens fulla värde genom innovativa lösningar*
**Om rollen**
 Som lösningsarkitekt har du en bred teknisk bakgrund samtidigt som du förstår verksamhetens behov och utmaningar och kan omsätta dessa till funktionella och icke-funktionella krav. Du kan hantera och mitigera risker, samla intressenter, har goda ledaregenskaper och är en duktig kommunikatör.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du in tidigt in i projekten med uppgiften att förstå verksamhetens mål och behov för att omsätta detta till den lösningsarkitektur som ger mest värde till verksamheten. Du arbetar i tät samverkan med både expertkollegor från Capgemini och kunden, tillsammans med utvecklingsteam, produktägare och kundens övriga intressenter.
   

  

 Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande och spännande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas.
   

  

 Vi arbetar professionellt och metodiskt i en lärande miljö och både din teamchef och ditt kompetensteam stöttar dig och din utveckling som konsult. Vi träffas ofta för att utbyta erfarenheter, lära oss nya saker i en bransch som ständigt förändras – och inte minst för att ha kul tillsammans!
   

  

**Din profil**
* Flera års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt
* Bakgrund inom systemutveckling, och vana av att leda andra
* Erfarenhet av arbete med etablerade metodiker och ramverk för arkitektur och agil systemutveckling.
* Högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande
* Goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska


**… Och Erfarenhet Eller Intresse Av**
* Konsultrollen samt av arbete med beslutsfattare
* Att verka utifrån kundens perspektiv och förmåga att analysera och utforma arkitektur och systemlösningar baserat på verksamhetens krav, processer och informationsbehov
* Molnbaserade lösningar, AI, säkerhet, processautomatisering eller integration
* Arbete som lösningsarkitekt i komplexa miljöer
* Certifierad IT-arkitekt


**Vad vi tror kommer att få dig att trivas**
* En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kompetens. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste tekniktrenderna och vara omgiven av duktiga kollegor.
* På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med starkt kundfokus, samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling.
* Vårt Digital Architecture-team i Stockholm består av ca 20 kollegor som arbetar som Enterprise-, Verksamhets- och lösningsarkitekter hos våra kunder.
* Capgemini har varit en dominerande aktör inom arkitekturområdet sedan 90-talet, med vårt eget ramverk Integrated Architecture Framework (IAF) och vi bidrar även aktivt till vidareutvecklingen av TOGAF.
* Vi har ett aktivt, globalt arkitektforum med lokala undergrupper där du kan dra nytta av globala och lokala experter inom arkitektur och även bidra med din egen erfarenhet.
* Våra värderingar: Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**Ansökan**
* Vi arbetar med löpande urval så vänta inte - skicka in din ansökan redan idag. Vi ser framemot din ansökan och att du vill bli en del av vår fortsatta resa!
* Observera att identitets- och bakgrundskontroller kan genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.


**Om Capgemini**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda övergången till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, generativ AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2024 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,1 miljarder euro.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Senior Partner Sales Manager, Europe North, AWS, Sweden
description:
**Description**
 Would you like to be part of a team that is redefining the IT industry? Amazon Web Services is leading the next paradigm shift in computing and is looking for world class candidates to help drive opportunities with our valued Benelux partner network. You will be at the heart of key trends like artificial intelligence, machine learning, serverless and IoT, helping customers with state-of-the-art technologies on AWS to innovate even faster.
   

  

 As Senior Partner Sales Manager for Enterprise in Sweden, you will deliver on our strategy to work with partners to accelerate adoption of Amazon’s infrastructure web services in the region. Extensive experience working for, or with Global and regional Systems Integrators, Managed Service Providers, Management Consulting firms and/or ISV partners is a must. The ideal candidate has the ability to build effective, multi-level relationships (including C-level) with partners and customers, creating a preference for AWS. You will collaborate with partners to accelerate the digital transformation in existing and new customers, working backwards from their business needs, positioning proven industry solutions built on AWS.g You will lead interactions with partners to create net new pipeline and accelerate joint customer opportunities, leveraging the benefits of the AWS Partner Funding Programs.
   

  

 As Senior Partner Sales Manager, you enjoy teamwork and building bridges. You are part of the AWS account team and will be collaborating closely with AWS Sales, partner development teams, professional services, large migration & modernization team, marketing and solution architects. You will own and execute the partner go-to-market strategy in close alignment with the Swedish Enterprise Sales leader.
   

  

 Are you customer obsessed, partner focused, and do you have a passion for technology? Then come build the future with us!
   

  

 AWS Global Sales
   

  

 AWS Global Sales drives adoption of the AWS cloud worldwide, enabling customers of all sizes to innovate and expand in the cloud. Our team empowers every customer to grow by providing tailored service, unmatched technology, and consistent support. We dive deep to understand each customer's unique challenges, then craft innovative solutions that accelerate their success. This customer-first approach is how we built the world's most adopted cloud. Join us and help us grow.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Build the partner strategy for the Swedish Enterprise target market in line with the AWS strategic direction.
* Define partner eco-system and relevant partner industry solutions to address key use cases, which accelerate innovation and cloud adoption for our customers.
* Coordinate and drive execution of the business plan while working with key internal stakeholders
* Manage and drive joint engagements between consulting partners, technology partners, Account Management and Partner Development team.
* Work with AWS account teams in a highly collaborative operating model to develop and launch pipeline opportunities
* Collaborate with partner bid desk team to support partners on solution support & pricing constructs


**About The Team**
 About AWS
   

  

 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 AWS values curiosity and connection. Our employee-led and company-sponsored affinity groups promote inclusion and empower our people to take pride in what makes us unique. Our inclusion events foster stronger, more collaborative teams. Our continual innovation is fueled by the bold ideas, fresh perspectives, and passionate voices our teams bring to everything we do.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Entrepreneurial “builder” mentality, 10+ years of technology related (partner) sales experience
* Experience working with Consulting Companies and/or technology vendors
* Experience developing detailed annual GTM plans
* Successful track record to achieving and exceeding quota and key performance metrics, proven ability to deliver results amid ambiguity and change
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Existing network with Enterpise businesses, GSI, SI, VAR, ISV community in Sweden
* Experience working within cloud solutions


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)

title: Agil Projektledare/ Kravanalytiker
description:
*Att välja Capgemini innebär att välja ett företag där du får möjlighet att forma din karriär på det sätt du önskar. Här kommer att få stöd och inspiration inom en samarbetsvillig gemenskap med kollegor både lokalt och runt om i världen, som ständigt omdefinierar vad som är möjligt. Du kommer att vara en del av området Cloud and Custom Application (C&CA) på Capgemini. Här kommer du att arbeta med de senaste teknologierna inom Cloud, Integration, AI och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi utvecklar skräddarsydda applikationer och hanterar komplexa integrationer för att maximera teknikens potential. Följ med oss och samarbeta med världens ledande organisationer för att realisera teknikens fulla värde genom innovativa lösningar*
**Om rollen**
 Som agil projektledare med bakgrund som kravanalytiker kommer du att verka i en nyckelroll inom agil utveckling, i regel som produktägare, release train engineer, scrum master eller verksamhetsutvecklare.
   

  

 Du kommer att verka på både organisations- och teamnivå med fokus på att förstå affärsbehoven och verksamheten samt driva förändring hos kunden.
   

  

 Projekten kan till exempel vara inom följande områden:
   

  

* Realisera en förbättrad kundupplevelse i olika kanaler
* Formulera och driva kravarbete inom digital transformation
* Driva systemutvecklingsprojekt baserat på digitala plattformar
* Leda utveckling av skräddarsydda lösningar baserad på olika teknologier
* Effektivisera systemlandskap t ex genom nya plattformar eller migrering till cloud


 Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas.
   

  

**Din profil**
**Erfarenhet Av Att**
* Formulera och driva kravarbete inom verksamhetsprojekt med inslag av IT och systemutveckling
* Coacha och leda agila utvecklingsteam (ej hårdvara) i rollen som produktägare, release train engineer eller scrum master
* Hantera agila verktyg såsom Jira/Confluence eller liknande
* Använda generativ AI och se potentialen för att utveckla och stödja projekten.
* Universitetsexamen inom systemvetenskap, informatik eller ingenjörsutbildning
* Goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska


**… Meriterande Med Certiferingar Inom**
* PSM1 /PSM2
* SAFe -certifiering
* PMI, IPMA
* IREB, REQB eller motsvarande


**Vad vi tror kommer att få dig att trivas**
* En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kundnöjdhet. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste trenderna och vara omgiven av skickliga kollegor.
* På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med högt kundfokus, en samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerlig lärande och utveckling.
* Vårt team i Stockholm består av medarbetare som levererar till publika och privata sektorn. Vi erbjuder även ett lokalt och internationellt nätverk inom Agile Delivery i Norden och världen vilket innebär att det alltid finns någon som kan hjälpa dig i det dagliga arbetet om du behöver stöd i dina leveranser.
* Som anställd hos oss blir du en del av en vass, teknik- och affärsfokuserad gemenskap, Här kan du bl.a välja mellan 250 000 kurser som täcker det mesta, inkl. certifieringar.
* Du kommer kontinuerligt att ha en dialog med din teamchef om hur du utvecklas avseende uppdrag, utbildningar och kundnöjdhet
* Våra värderingar: Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**Ansökan**
* Vi arbetar med löpande urval så vänta inte - skicka in din ansökan redan idag. Vi ser framemot din ansökan och att du vill bli en del av vår fortsatta resa!
* Observera att identitets- och bakgrundskontroller kan genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.


**Om Capgemini**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda övergången till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, generativ AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2024 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,1 miljarder euro.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: SAP Sourcing & Procurement consultant
description:
Do you have a passion for transforming businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies? Are you looking for a place where you could combine your business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how? Then our roles as SAP Sourcing & Procurement consultant in our SAP Business Group are a perfect find for you!
   

  

 Bring your talent and passion to Accenture and help us deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Take this opportunity to develop your skills and build an extraordinary career. You will play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world. Let there be change!
   

  

**About Our Nordic SAP Business Group**
 Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As the leading Nordic and Global SAP transformation partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major SAP S/4 HANA driven business transformation programs with several of the biggest companies.
   

  

 Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, Ariba, Icertis, SAP BTP and SAP RISE. Our proven delivery methods inclde preconfigured industry template and embrace new capabilities introduced by AI .
   

  

 We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking at experienced candidates for several positions and seniority levels.
   

  

 To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
   

  

**What’s in it for you:**
- Work with some of the biggest SAP clients in large global implementation projects.

- Be an integral part of innovative SAP transformation projects.

- Significant development opportunities and support for progressing in your professional career.

- Rich opportunities to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills.

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert network and benchmarks.

- A dedicated mentor to guide you during your work with continuous feedback.

- Being part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment.

- Utilize your functional and technical expertise in SAP, by analyzing, designing, and implementing business processes supported by SAP best practice solutions.

- Utilize your Industry expertise in the field of SAP solutions to deliver client value as a professional individual and as part of a team.

- Take part in our highly engaged and diverse global network, for collaboration and delivery.

- Competitive compensation and benefits.

- Help clients’ sustainability agenda through SAP transformations.

- Be a valuable member of our Nordic SAP Smart Procurement Value Tower and contribute to thought leadership, competence development, and sales initiatives.

**SAP Smart Procurement Nordic Value Tower**
 The sourcing & procurement function is shifting. Traditionally driven and managed by deep and complex processes, their future must become digital, data driven and automated. Helping our clients to succeed in this transformation journey is what we thrive for.
   

  

 SAP Smart Procurement Value Tower is one out of 10 different process specialization communities within our Nordic SAP Business Group.
   

  

 We work hand in hand with our procurement strategy colleagues and our global delivery centers.
   

  

 Our cross-Nordics team designs and configure sourcing & procurement processes in S/4 HANA, Ariba upstream and downstream processes and Fieldglass - and we excel both in large, global S/4 HANA engagements (from smart brownfield through full business transformations) as well as in more focused multi-step process capability deployments.
   

  

**Required Qualifications**
- Min. 3 years of hands-on SAP S/4 HANA sourcing & procurement experience as consultant from at least two S/4HANA projects (preferably in the Nordics)

- Based in Nordics or EU, with either EU citizenship or valid work permit

- Good understanding of sourcing and procurement business processes and their key value drivers

- Eagerness to shape and work in a team-oriented environment

- Motivated, persistent, eager to optimize, drive for excellence

- Passionate about SAP, innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Effectively work with cross-functional teams/stakeholders in an international and fast-moving environment

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility, and team player

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English

- Strong will to pursue a problem, identify the source, and propose possible solutions in collaboration with other team members in a timely manner

- A Bachelor or Master’s degree

- We recruit at different levels. For manager level and above, we would like you to have:

- at least 7 years of relevant project experience as well as

- having led a team

- demonstrating leadership skills, and ideally also

- some earlier involvement in the acquisition of new projects (business development).

**Preferred Qualifications**
- Experience of the full S/4 project lifecycle including estimating, planning, and delivering a solution end-to-end

- Nordic (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish or Finnish) language spoken

- An SAP certification in relevant area

- Ariba experience in addition to S/4 HANA configuration

- Deep business & industry experience in one or more industries

**Location**
 Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö
   

  

**Does this appeal to you?**
 If so, we really wish to hear from you! (We need people who can challenge conventional wisdom, offer unique perspectives, and contribute with innovative solutions.)
   

  

*If you are interested to learn more about Accenture´s recruitment process, great! We have gathered more info for you* 
*here.*
 Pleasenote that due to the summer season, our hiring process may be slower than usual. We apologize for any delay in responding to your applications. Rest assured, we are committed to reviewing each application thoroughly. We appreciate your patience during this time.

title: Data Engineer (Team lead)
description:
På Capgemini får du möjlighet att forma din karriär på ett sätt som passar dig, med stöd av en global gemenskap av experter som inspirerar och ger dig kraft. Vi tror på att omdefiniera vad som är möjligt - att använda teknik för att bygga en mer hållbar och inkluderande värld. Vårt Insights & Data-team är i framkant av denna mission och levererar helhetslösningar inom Data & AI över olika industrier. Med över 800 specialister i Norden utnyttjar vi strategiska partnerskap med Google, AWS, Microsoft, Databricks och Snowflake för att skala Data & Analytics i molnet. Här är din expertis och ditt perspektiv viktigt - anslut dig till oss för att driva innovation och transformera industrier med banbrytande datalösningar!
   

  

 Är du redo att ta din karriär till nästa nivå? Vi söker nu vår nästa Team Lead inom AI & Data Engineering-enheten – en roll som kombinerar ledarskap och praktiskt arbete.
   

  

**Om rollen**
*Som Data Engineer med fokus på Azure eller Databricks kommer du att:*
* Designa och bygga datapipelines med Databricks och Apache Spark för att hantera data i Azure.
* Utveckla och underhålla säkra datalager och data lakehouses med datamodeller och kvalitetskontroller.
* Bygga och distribuera AI/ML-modeller med Databricks ML och Azure ML för affärsinsikter.
* Övervaka samt optimera datapipelines och infrastruktur för effektivitet och skalbarhet.
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för framgångsrika implementationer.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad inom det ständigt föränderliga landskapet av big data-teknologier och bästa praxis.


**Som Team Lead Kommer Du Att**
* Leda ett team på 5-10 konsulter. Du kommer att stötta ditt team med coachning och skapa en positiv och motiverande arbetsmiljö.
* Ha fokus på dina teammedlemmars individuella karriärutveckling. Genom regelbundna one-on-one-samtal hjälper du dina konsulter att planera sina karriärer och nå sina mål. Du blir den person våra anställda vänder sig till för vägledning och stöd.
* Vara en del av ledningsgruppen inom AI & Data Engineering.
* Vi tror på att ge våra chefer möjlighet att prioritera människor och kunder framför administrativa uppgifter.


**Din profil**
* Flerårig erfarenhet inom Data Engineering
* Dokumenterad expertis inom exempelvis Azure, Databricks, Apache Spark och utveckling av datapipelines samt stark förståelse för datalagerkoncept och praxis.
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft Azure-molnplattform, inklusive Azure Data Lake Storage, Databricks och Azure Data Factory.
* Kunskap om SQL och skriptspråk som Python samt praktisk erfarenhet av AI/ML-koncept och verktyg.


**Observera:** 
 På grund av semestertider kan handläggningen av din ansökan ta längre tid än vanligt. Vi återkommer under augusti. Tack för ditt tålamod!
   

  

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**
* Vi förstår vikten av flexibelt arbete. Oavsett om det är distansarbete eller flexibla arbetstider, kommer du att få en miljö som hjälper dig att upprätthålla en hälsosam balans mellan arbete och fritid.
* I hjärtat av vårt uppdrag ligger din karriärutveckling. Vårt utbud av karriärutvecklingsprogram och olika yrken är utformade för att stödja dig i att utforska en värld av möjligheter.
* Utrusta dig med värdefulla certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna såsom Databricks, Azure, Fabrics eller Snowflake.

title: Account Solution Engineer - Mulesoft
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
*To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.*
 Job Category
   

  

 Sales
   

  

 Job Details
   

  

**About Salesforce**
 Salesforce is the #1 AI CRM, where humans with agents drive customer success together. Here, ambition meets action. Tech meets trust. And innovation isn’t a buzzword — it’s a way of life. The world of work as we know it is changing and we're looking for Trailblazers who are passionate about bettering business and the world through AI, driving innovation, and keeping Salesforce's core values at the heart of it all.
   

  

 Ready to level-up your career at the company leading workforce transformation in the agentic era? You’re in the right place! Agentforce is the future of AI, and you are the future of Salesforce.
   

  

* Salesforce is hiring for a Solutions Engineer within MuleSoft to join our Pre-Sales Solution Engineering team, which plays a pivotal role in driving MuleSoft's growth. As a Pre-Sales Solution Engineer, you will serve as a technical sales partner to our sales teams, aligning our solutions with our customers' visions. The MuleSoft Sales team will lean on your technical and product expertise throughout the sales cycle to formulate the sales strategy. You will be a vital contributor to the success of both our customers and Account Executives by conducting technical discovery, qualification, reframing, challenging the status quo, delivering product demonstrations and Proof of Concepts, facilitating technical workshops, and offering architectural recommendations.


 In the role of a customer trusted advisor, you will bridge the gap between the technical solution and the desired business outcomes for the customer. You will take ownership of solution reliability and be the conduit for ensuring the customer's needs are met.
   

  

**What You Get Working For MuleSoft Solution Engineering Sweden**
* Working in a passionate Pre-Sales Solution Engineering team that puts teamwork first
* Leaders who really care about your development and success
* Working for a company that truly lives its core values Equality and Sustainability
* Working for one of the most innovative companies worldwide


**Qualifications You’ll Need To Be Successful**
* Excellent presentation and composure abilities in front of technical and non-technical key stakeholders
* Skills to establish trust with clients, and the ability to influence key decision makers
* Solid oral, written, presentation, collaboration and interpersonal communication skills
* Ability to work as part of a team to solve technical problems in alignment with the sales strategy
* Degree in IT / Business Informatics or equivalent relevant experience required
* Hands-on Java development experience and ability to code and debug against Java APIs is preferred
* Experience with cloud technologies - iPaaS, SaaS applications, Automation solutions, cloud infrastructure, IA is preferred
* Experience building and delivering Proofs of Concept (PoCs) and responding to functional & technical elements of RFIs/RFPs independently
* A passion for technology and an ability to translate that passion to impact business for our customers
* Ability to travel as needed
* Languages: English + Swedish are essential
* Minimum of 4 years of professional experience
* Experience will be evaluated based on alignment to the core competencies for the role (e.g. extracurricular leadership roles, military experience, volunteer work, etc.)


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Salesforce and/or MuleSoft Certifications
* Previous experience as a solution/sales engineer for a Software company in similar technologies (Integration, APIM, Automation, CRM, Analytics,...)


**What You’ll Achieve**
* 3 months:
+ Learn MuleSoft Anypoint Platform and get certified in MuleSoft’s Developer Trainings
+ Complete MuleSoft’s Kickstart sales training
+ Begin to build your architecture reframe and whiteboarding skills through shadowing and customer-scenario role playing
+ Create a Self Service Asset on a MuleSoft technical topic of interest

* 12 months:
+ Become certified in all Product, Architecture, and Sales Messaging trainings
+ Execute Architectural Workshops/Engagements, PoCs, and demos with our Partners
+ Enabling partners on technical and architectural elements of the MuleSoft platform
+ Mentoring, assisting, and enabling partners through Pre-Sales Engagements
+ Guide our strategic Partner Technologists, Client Leads, Practice Leads, Vertical BU leads, CTOs, Engineers, and Consultants through MuleSoft Point of View
+ Create and execute high impact Technical/Architectural presentations and top notch programs/workshops/demos, for Partner Technical and Architectural enablement
+ Respond to functional and technical elements of RFIs/RFPs
+ Partner with the Channel Teams and the sales reps in the partner on account planning and strategy and support marketing with evangelism activities (writing blogs, participating in demo-driven webinars, speaking at industry events, etc.)


****Benefits & Perks****
 Check out our benefits site which explains our various benefits, including well-being reimbursement, generous parental leave, adoption assistance, fertility benefits, and more
   

  

 Unleash Your Potential
   

  

 When you join Salesforce, you’ll be limitless in all areas of your life. Our benefits and resources support you to find balance and
 *be your best* 
 , and our AI agents accelerate your impact so you can
 *do your best* 
 . Together, we’ll bring the power of Agentforce to organizations of all sizes and deliver amazing experiences that customers love. Apply today to not only shape the future — but to redefine what’s possible — for yourself, for AI, and the world.
   

  

 Accommodations
   

  

 If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.
   

  

 Posting Statement
   

  

 Salesforce is an equal opportunity employer and maintains a policy of non-discrimination with all employees and applicants for employment. What does that mean exactly? It means that at Salesforce, we believe in equality for all. And we believe we can lead the path to equality in part by creating a workplace that’s inclusive, and free from discrimination. Know your rights: workplace discrimination is illegal. Any employee or potential employee will be assessed on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications – without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, transgender status, age, disability, veteran or marital status, political viewpoint, or other classifications protected by law. This policy applies to current and prospective employees, no matter where they are in their Salesforce employment journey. It also applies to recruiting, hiring, job assignment, compensation, promotion, benefits, training, assessment of job performance, discipline, termination, and everything in between. Recruiting, hiring, and promotion decisions at Salesforce are fair and based on merit. The same goes for compensation, benefits, promotions, transfers, reduction in workforce, recall, training, and education.

title: Snowflake Superhero
description:
**Job Description**
 We're looking for passionate experts who shine with their exceptional skills and active involvement in the Snowflake community.
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to be a Snowflake Data Superhero?
   

  

**Your role**
 As a Solution Architect/ Lead Data Engineer with a Snowflake focus, you will be building scalable and secure data platforms. You will leverage your expertise in Snowflake and other plattforms like Azure and/or AWS to design, develop, and implement data plattforms, data warehouses, data lakehouses, and AI/ML plattforms that fuel our data-driven operations. You will also be working to develop, influence and grow our Snowflake community.
   

  

*In this role you will play a key part in:*
 Develop and maintain secure data warehouses and data lakehouses: Implement data models, data quality checks, and governance practices to ensure reliable and accurate data.
   

  

 Build and deploy AI/ML models: Integrate Machine Learning into data pipelines, leverage Snowflake Snowpark, Cortex and Marketplace to develop models and drive business insights.
   

  

 Design and build high-performance data pipelines - utilize Snowflake, Python, and Apache Spark.
   

  

 Collaborate with cross-functional teams: Work closely with business analysts, data scientists, and DevOps engineers to ensure successful data platform implementations.
   

  

 Stay ahead of the curve: Continuously learn and adapt to the evolving landscape of big data technologies and best practices. Drive our Snowflake community.
   

  

**Your Profile**
 Minimum 8 years of experience as a Data Engineer or similar role.
   

  

 Proven expertise in Snowflake, Apache Spark, and data pipeline development and strong understanding of data warehousing concepts and practices.
   

  

 Experience with Microsoft Azure cloud platform and tools like DBT.
   

  

 Strong knowledge of SQL & Python and hands-on experience with AI/ML concepts and tools.
   

  

 Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills and strong communication and teamwork skills.
   

  

 Passion for data and a thirst for learning.
   

  

 Snowflake SnowPro – or on your way there
   

  

**You Are Someone Who Is Either**
* An official Snowflake Snowpro, recognized for your technical excellence and community contributions, or
* A high-level Snowflake expert with the ambition and potential to become a Snowpro. With Capgemini’s support, network, and close partnership with Snowflake, we’ll help you take that next step.


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We partner with names such as Google, Microsoft, Amazon and Databricks, which can equip you with valuable certifications in the latest technologies, if that is your ambition.


**Your Application**
 Welcome to apply!
   

  

*As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.*
**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want** 
 | www.capgemini.com

title: Systemintegratör verifiering
company_industry: Defense and Space Manufacturing, Security and Investigations, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Drivs du av att se dina idéer bli verklighet? Välkommen till vår spännande och teknikintensiva värld.
   

  

 Din roll
   

  

 Inom Surface and Aircraft Systems arbetar vi med komplexa system som används på plattformar som stridsflygplan och stridsfartyg. Som Systemintegratör kommer du att testa hela EW-system med stort fokus på mjukvara, där du deltar i förberedelser, utförande, dokumentation och analys av våra systemtester. Automatisering och utveckling för att förbättra vår miljö är en naturlig del av din roll, och du kommer även att utvärdera resultat från simuleringar för att säkerställa att hård- och mjukvara möter kundens förväntningar. Ibland innebär det att du, tillsammans med en utvecklingskollega, samarbetar för att upptäcka och lösa eventuella problem som uppstår i systemet.
   

  

 Du kommer att bli en del av ett sammansvetsat team på omkring 15 personer, som nu expanderar för att möta den ökande efterfrågan. Vår grupp är välkomnande och vi värdesätter samarbete, positivitet och ödmjukhet.
   

  

 Resor förekommer i rollen, och kan i vissa fall även innebära något längre perioder av arbete på plats hos våra kunder.
   

  

 Din profil
   

  

 För att lyckas i den här rollen behöver du utöver en praktisk hårdvaru- och mjukvaruförmåga även ha en förmåga att strukturera, dokumentera och planera ditt arbete. Trivas med att gifta ihop hårdvara med mjukvara. Vi hoppas att du har, likasom vi, har en positiv inställning och ett intresse att skapa goda samarbeten. Om du trivs med att utforska tekniska områden, ta itu med utmaningar inom världsledande teknik, då är du rätt person för oss. Vi ser även gärna att du har ett analytiskt och kvalitetsinriktat tänk genom ditt arbete.
   

  

 Vi söker dig med:
   

  

* Civil- eller Högskoleingenjörsexamen
* 3 års erfarenhet i rollen som Systemintegratör och/eller som Nätverksspecialist
* Arbetat med verifiering och har vana att skapa verifieringsrapporter
* Resa i tjänsten, både inrikes och utrikes.
* Goda kunskaper i både det svenska och engelska språket, såväl tal som skrift
* Kännedom om Försvarsindustrin (meriterande)


*Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.*
 Vad du blir en del av
   

  

 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 24 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

 Om du är intresserad av vilka förmåner som du kan ta del av som anställd på Saab i Sverige, kan du läsa om dem här
   

  

 Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.

title: Data- och informationssamordnare inom väg och järnväg
description:
Tyréns är ett av Sveriges ledande konsultföretag inom samhällsbyggnad. Vi är specialister inom stadsutveckling, arkitektur och infrastruktur som bygger samhällen som håller.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Som
 *Data- och informationssamordnare inom väg och järnväg* 
 hos oss på Tyréns kommer du arbeta inom vårt nationella affärsområde
 *BIM Strategi & Samordning* 
 och kompetensområde
 *Informationssamordning* 
 För att hitta mer information om vad vi gör inom detta kompetensområde klickar du
 *här* 
 .
   

  

 I stora infrastrukturuppdrag arbetar du tätt med BIM-samordning, applikationsspecialister och uppdrags/projekteringsledning för att fastställa strategi och arbetssätt med avseende på projektering och modellsamordning.
   

  

 I denna roll kommer du exempelvis jobba med att:
   

  

* Teknikansvarig Datasamordning
* Leda arbetet med i uppdragen
* Administration av Sharepoint, projketerings- och samordningsplattform
* Projektuppstart
* Hantering av inkommande underlag
* Behörighetshantering
* Delgivning och leverans mellan olika datamiljöer
* Leveranskontroll och kvalitetssäkring av dokument, ritningar och modeller
* Data- och informationssäkerhetsfrågor


**Vi erbjuder**
* Fantastiska kollegor och många specialister inom våra olika kompetensområden
* En värderingsdriven kultur där Connect, Create & Challenge är våra ledord
* En stimulerande arbetsmiljö i våra lokaler med möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån del av din arbetstid
* Arbete i projekt tillsammans med dina Tyréns-kollegor, vi jobbar ofta i teamleveranser (sällan som enstaka resurser på plats hos våra kunder)
* Möjlighet att jobba med innovationsprojekt
* Kompetensutveckling anpassad efter dig
* Sociala aktiviteter, både på och efter ordinarie arbetstid
* Fast månadslön
* Extra lediga dagar utöver dina semesterdagar, vi är t.ex. alltid lediga med lön dagarna mellan jul och nyår
* Flertalet personalförmåner via vår förmånsportal
* Kollektivavtal som vi tecknat med Innovationsföretagen (Almega)


 Klicka
 *här* 
 för att läsa mer om oss, vilken typ av projekt vi jobbar med, vilka utvecklingsmöjligheter som finns, våra innovationer, läsa bloggar och lyssna på våra medarbetares podcasts.
   

  

**Vi söker**
 För att lyckas och trivas i rollen anser vi att du bör ha:
   

  

* Minst sju års erfarenhet i rollen som datasamordnare inom infrastruktur projekt
* Vana av att arbeta i multidisciplinära uppdrag


 Meriterande är erfarenhet/kunskap inom:
   

  

* BIM-samordning
* Datorvana
* Bentley ProjectWise
* Bentley Microstation
* Autodesk AutoCAD eller Civil3D
* Autodesk Navisworks
* Autodesk Vault professional
* Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC)
* Microsoft 365
* Microsoft Sharepoint
* Trafikverket Chaos


 Personliga egenskaper vi tror passar rollen och vår företagskultur:
   

  

* Kommunikativ
* Strukturerad
* Våga fatta snabba beslut
* Lösningsorienterad


 För denna tjänst ser vi att du hanterar det svenska och engelska språket i både tal och skrift för att kunna tillmötesgå våra kunder och kollegors behov.
   

  

**Ansöka**
 Du är varmt välkommen med din ansökan! Personligt brev är inte ett krav hos oss, men kommer naturligtvis läsas om det bifogas.
   

  

 Vi rekryterar löpande, så skicka gärna din ansökan redan idag då tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.
   

  

 Med hänvisning till GDPR tar vi inte emot ansökningar per mejl utan hanterar enbart ansökningar som kommer in via ansökningslänken.
   

  

*Med anledning av sommarsemester kan återkoppling på din ansökan komma att dröja till i slutet på augusti/början på september beroende på när du ansöker.*
**Kontakt**
 Vill du veta mer om tjänsten eller har frågor? Då är du välkommen att kontakta:
   

  

**Jakob Berggren**
**Avdelningschef**
 Mejl: Jakob.Berggren@tyrens.se
   

  

 Telefon: 010-452 20 84
   

  

 Tyréns är ett av Sveriges ledande konsultföretag inom samhällsbyggnad. I samspel med kunder och partners skapar vi hållbara lösningar inom stadsutveckling och infrastruktur. Tyrénskoncernen har 3 000 medarbetare med verksamhet i Sverige, Storbritannien, Estland, Litauen, Polen, Bulgarien och Kanada. Tyréns är stiftelseägt och vår ägandeform gör det möjligt för oss att satsa målmedvetet på forskning och innovation inom samhällsbyggnadsområdet. Vi drivs av nyfikenhet och har ett nära samarbete med universitet och högskolor.
   

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

  

 Tillbaka
   

  

 Ansök

title: Senior Consultant | AI & Data
description:
Amsterdam Data Collective is a leading European data and AI consultancy, partnering with organisations to drive responsible and impactful AI transformation. We deliver strategic advice and tailored, end-to-end solutions across sectors including financial services, life sciences, healthcare, the public sector, agriculture, and retail.
 



  





 Our multidisciplinary expertise covers the full data value chain:
 



**Data Strategy** 
 – Actionable, business-aligned AI and data roadmaps
 



**Data Engineering** 
 – Secure, scalable, future-proof data architectures
 



**Analytics & Data Science** 
 – AI-powered tools solving real-world problems
 



**Design & Visualisation** 
 – In partnership with our in-house studio CLEVER°FRANKE, we turn complex insights into intuitive user experiences
 



  





 For this position, unfortunately we do not provide relocation support (we sponsor visas), therefore we are looking for candidates
 **living in Sweden.** 




  





**What you do:** 



* Support the growth of ADC in Sweden and the Nordics through strong delivery and business development
* Manage projects from scoping to execution, aligning stakeholders and ensuring timely delivery
* **Build AI solutions that drive real value — from strategy to deployment**
* **Translate complex business needs into technical solutions and communicate clearly with clients**
* Work hands-on in the cloud (infra setup, CI/CD, monitoring)
* Create project plans and estimates and nurture client relationships
* Stay up to date with the evolving AI landscape and apply new developments effectively
* Represent ADC’s values: pragmatism, comprehensiveness, trust, and ownership



  





**What you bring:** 



* **3-6 years of working experience** 
 in areas such as Data Engineering, Software Engineering, Data Science, Machine Learning, Advanced Analytics or Artificial Intelligence
 **(Consultancy is preferred)**
* A finished quantitative BA or MA degree (e.g., Physics, Mathematics, Econometrics, Data Science, AI, Computer Science)
* **Stakeholder management and business development experience**
* Hands-on experience and
 **understanding of processing unstructured (text) data, using NLP algorithms or LLMs**
* Software development skills and hands-on experience deploying to the cloud (e.g. provisioning infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring)
* Expertise in programming in
 **Python**
* Expertise in AI development frameworks such as
 **LangChain, Autogen, Llamaindex**
* Familiarity in Cloud environments
* Expertise in working with databases and database languages
* **Excellent command of both English and Swedish**



  





**What we offer:** 




 At ADC, we don’t just offer jobs - we offer growth, impact, and a sense of belonging. We empower you to take ownership, build something meaningful, and thrive collectively.
 


* **A steep learning curve** 
 - take on responsibility from day one and grow into a trusted advisor, specialist, or future ADC leader
* **Projects that make an impact -** 
 where you’ll tackle real-world challenges and drive meaningful change
* **Freedom to innovate -** 
 bring your ideas to life and help shape the future of risk management
* **Ongoing learning & development -** 
 with peer groups, project presentations, mentorship programs and Collective Lunch Sharing Sessions
* **Our Collective Week -** 
 a week with the entire ADC team, where we collaborate on pro bono projects and create unforgettable memories
* **A competitive salary** 
 with a collective bonus structure - because we believe in rewarding success as a team
* **The opportunity to invest** 
 in the company, once you meet the conditions
* **A welcoming office space in the center of Stockholm** 
 . Various social events, including Friday drinks, events, sports activities, etc.



  





 At ADC, we believe in building with heart—where people, ethics, and impact come first. Ready to join us?
 



  





  





 \*Amsterdam Data Collective is an equal opportunity employer. To shape a better future, we value diversity and promote equality. No characteristics are discriminated against, as indicated in
 **Directive 2000/78/EC** 
 . We encourage and welcome all applications. Additional arrangements or adjustments to support your application can be discussed further.

title: Senior SAP S/4HANA Finance Lead
description:
At PBS Nordics, a Capgemini business unit, we empower individuals to shape their careers within a collaborative global community.
   

  

 Specializing in ERP transformation services for both public and private sectors, PBS Nordics delivers tailored solutions using top ERP systems like SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and IFS. With a strong Nordic presence and a diverse global client portfolio, we guide organizations through seamless ERP transformations, driving operational excellence and strategic growth.
   

  

**Your Role**
* Participate in S/4Hana assessments, outline finance business challenges and opportunities and turn this into SAP value opportunities, solutions and implementation roadmaps.
* Build trusted client relationships with client finance executives and provide strategic advice and expertise to clients on SAP S/4HANA Finance solutions, including General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Asset Accounting, Controlling, performance management, and Treasury.
* Serving as overall program finance lead, ensuring successful implementation of SAP S/4HANA Finance and controlling solutions in alignment with business requirements and best practices.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate SAP S/4HANA Finance with other SAP modules (e.g., SD, MM, PP, WM, PM) and external systems.
* Lead finance teams and mentor junior consultants, fostering their professional development and ensuring high-quality project delivery.
* Stay current with industry trends, the latest developments in SAP S/4HANA Finance, and emerging technologies to continuously enhance service delivery.


**Your Profile**
* Experienced finance lead with proven track record of successful SAP S/4HANA Finance implementations and optimizations within global organizations.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with clients and team members.
* Minimum 10 years of experience as an SAP S/4HANA Finance lead.
* Strong understanding of financial processes and the ability to align SAP solutions with business objectives.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* SAP certification in SAP S/4HANA Finance is highly desirable.


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training, a global network of experts and an innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success.
* Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.
* A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, modesty, Fun, and Boldness.
* A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.


**Application**
*In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis. As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.*
**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Grid Integration - System Studies Analyst (Senior / Specialist)
description:
Job Description


We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Power System Studies Analyst (Senior / Specialist) to join our team in Stockholm, Sweden. In this role, you will be responsible for conducting complex power system studies, analysing grid performance, and providing expert recommendations to ensure the reliability and efficiency of electrical power systems.

* Perform advanced power system studies, including load flow, short circuit, and stability analyses
* Develop and maintain detailed power system models for various network configurations
* Analyse the impact of renewable energy integration and grid modernisation initiatives on power system performance
* Conduct thorough assessments of power quality issues and propose mitigation strategies
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimise power system designs and operations
* Prepare comprehensive technical reports and present findings to stakeholders
* Stay up-to-date with industry standards, regulations, and emerging technologies in power systems
* Mentor junior engineers and contribute to the development of best practices within the team
* Participate in client meetings and provide expert advice on complex power system issues


Qualifications


* Master's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field
* Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in power system studies and analysis
* Advanced knowledge of power system analysis software such as ETAP, DIgSILENT PowerFactory, or PSS/E
* Proven expertise in power system modelling, simulation, and analysis techniques
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a detail-oriented approach
* Excellent technical writing and communication skills in English
* In-depth understanding of power system operations, planning, and grid codes
* Experience with load flow, short circuit, and stability studies
* Familiarity with renewable energy integration and grid modernisation concepts
* Knowledge of industry standards and regulations (e.g., IEC, IEEE)
* Experience with smart grid technologies and concepts
* Professional Engineering (PE) certification or equivalent is preferred
* Ability to work efficiently and organise multiple projects simultaneously
* Strong teamwork skills and the ability to mentor junior engineers


Company Description


AFRY provides engineering, design, digital and advisory services. We are devoted experts in industry, energy and infrastructure sectors, creating impact for generations to come. AFRY has Nordic roots with a global reach. Join us in accelerating the transition towards a sustainable society.


Additional Information


At AFRY, many of us are passionate, not just at work but also in our free time. We believe that if you have fun in life, you perform better! We want to be your ideal employer, regardless of the phase of life you are in, and we understand the importance of a balance between private life and work. We want to attract people with different backgrounds and perspectives to our organization. Diversity is positive in many ways for us at AFRY. We know it drives both creativity and innovation. Therefore, we would like to mention some of the benefits you receive if you join us:

* Fixed salary and collective agreement: Secure components that are a given for us!
* Further development through training and our assignments, as well as networking with our skilled consultants.
* Club AFRY: Our staff club with opportunities for cultural and sports events, book club, cottage rentals, yoga, etc.


Both positions are based in Stockholm, Västerås, Uppsala, Ludvika, Gothenburg, or Malmö, with flexibility to work both from our office and home, in consultation with the manager.


Have we caught your interest? We hope so! Join our team at AFRY and be part of a dynamic, customer-focused environment that values expertise and innovation.


The last day for application is 2024-09-14, but we evaluate applications and process recruitment on a rolling basis, so why not submit your application today?


Contact information  

Mustafa Ibrahim, Head of T&D Sweden, Grid Integration, Substation and Distribution & Acting Head of Business Section, System Studies, FACTS and HVDC  

mustafa.ibrahim@afry.com

*At AFRY, we engineer change in everything we do. Change happens when brave ideas come together. When we collaborate, innovate technology, and embrace challenging points of view. That’s how we're making future. We are actively looking for qualified candidates to join our inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. Join us in accelerating the transition towards a sustainable future.*


Apply information


Position


Grid Integration - System Studies Analyst (Senior / Specialist)
Location


Västerås, Stockholm
Country


Sweden
Reference number


REF10053P
company_addresses:
Our headquarters are in Stockholm, Sweden yet our businesses and clients extend right across the globe. 

Frösundaleden 2
SE 169 70, Stockholm

info@afry.com
+46105050000

title: Senior Test Engineer
description:
Be visionary
Teledyne Technologies Incorporated provides enabling technologies for industrial growth markets that require advanced technology and high reliability. These markets include aerospace and defense, factory automation, air and water quality environmental monitoring, electronics design and development, oceanographic research, deepwater oil and gas exploration and production, medical imaging and pharmaceutical research.
We are looking for individuals who thrive on making an impact and want the excitement of being on a team that wins.  

Job Description  

Are you a Senior Test Engineer? Then join our innovative team at Teledyne FLIR defense!
Teledyne FLIR is a global leader in defense technologies and integrated sensing solutions with 15,000 employees worldwide, including 1,700 in our defense division. Our Sweden site in Arninge/Täby is home to around 600 employees, and in your immediate team you’ll be collaborating with about 50 talented colleagues. Since 1978, we’ve been pushing the boundaries of innovation, delivering advanced solutions that help military and defense personnel operate efficiently and effectively in critical environments.
We are now looking for a passionate, experienced test engineer to help us take our defense technology to the next level. If you want to work with cutting-edge systems that make a real difference, this is the place for you.
What We Offer* Shape the Future: Be part of our transformation journey from legacy systems to next-generation defense tech.
* Team Spirit: Work in a collaborative, inclusive environment where problem-solving and creativity thrive.
* Global Reach: Collaborate with skilled colleagues from around the world.
* Security & Stability: Join a financially strong and growing company.
* Wellbeing Perks: Healthcare benefits, free gym access, and a variety of sports activities.


Your Responsibilities* Lead testing activities: Drive our transition from manual to automated testing, establishing robust testing practices that improves speed, coverage and reliability.
* Inspire the team! Use your insights and deep knowledge to teach and inspire your colleagues to drive the acceptance process.
* Automation development: Design and implement automated test frameworks in Phyton, collaborating closely with software developers to integrate testing seamlessly into the development process.
* Software Verification & Validation: Ensure system integrity by setting up routines and work processes that test and verify software through the development process before release.
* Hands-On hardware and software testing: Engage directly and test our products, ensuring that our delivery to our customer meets our high standards.
* Test design & execution: Develop, maintain, and execute comprehensive tests plans and test cases that meet project/customer requirements and specifications.
* Issue resolution: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to reproduce, analyze, and resolve complex issues.
* Quality leadership: Champion best practices in testing, continuously driving improvements in, tools, processes, and methodologies.


What you bring (Must have)* Education: Master’s degree in computer science, Embedded Systems, Electronics, or a related field.
* Embedded systems experience: Proven track record of testing and validating embedded software and hardware solutions.
* Automation expertise: hands-on experience driving transition from manual to automated testing, with solid skills in test framework development.
* Programing proficiency: Strong coding ability in Python (or similar high -level languages) for automation scripting.
* System-level testing: Experience testing across both hardware and software environments, ensuring seamless system integration.
* Tool knowledge: Familiar with version control (e.g., Git), bug tracking (e.g., Jira) and test management tools (e.g., TestRail, Zephyr).
* CI/CD Practices: Knowledge of modern continuous integration/continuous deployment pipelines and automated test environments.
* Passion for technology: A genuine drive to explore, learn, and apply new tools and methods in testing and quality assurance.
* Language skills: Excellent written and spoken English


Your Profile* Structured & Detail-Oriented: You have a systematic approach to work and ensure nothing is overlooked.
* Accountable: You take ownership of tasks and deliver high-quality results on time.
* Curious & Innovative: You enjoy problem-solving, exploring new tools, and finding smarter ways to test and improve systems.
* Proactive Collaborator: You take initiative, share knowledge, and work effectively with cross-functional teams.
* Quality-Driven Mindset: You care deeply about building reliable, secure, and high-performing solutions.


Security & Eligibility Requirements
Due to the sensitive nature of our work in the defense industry:* You must be able to work in Sweden and pass a security background check.
* The role requires access to export-controlled information or items under ITAR/EAR regulations. Applicants must be eligible for the necessary U.S. export control licenses.
* This is an on-site position based in Arninge/Täby (Sweden).


Join us and help develop the next generation of defense technology!  

Teledyne and all of our employees are committed to conducting business with the highest ethical standards. We require all employees to comply with all applicable laws, regulations, rules and regulatory orders. Our reputation for honesty, integrity and high ethics is as important to us as our reputation for making innovative sensing solutions.
.

title: Senior Process Engineer
description:
**Bring more to life.**


Are you ready to accelerate your potential and make a real difference within life sciences, diagnostics and biotechnology?


At Cepheid, one of Danaher’s 15+ operating companies, our work saves lives—and we’re all united by a shared commitment to innovate for tangible impact.


You’ll thrive in a culture of belonging where you and your unique viewpoint matter. And by harnessing Danaher’s system of continuous improvement, you help turn ideas into impact – innovating at the speed of life.


At Cepheid, we are passionate about improving health care through fast, accurate, molecular diagnostic systems and tests. As a member of our team, you’ll get to make an immediate, measurable impact on a global scale, within an environment that fosters career growth and development. Our mission drives us to develop groundbreaking solutions for the world’s most complex health challenges. Together, we bring MORE change to the world.


Learn about the Danaher Business System which makes everything possible.


The Senior Process engineer is responsible for leading the development and ongoing enhancement of both new and existing processes and equipment.


In this role you will serve as the primary engineering liaison to Operations throughout all stages of product and equipment life cycles.


This position is part of the Engineering team focused on our reagent on board filling lines and will be located in our Solna manufacturing site.

**In this role, you will have the opportunity to:**

* Lead validation activities for new and existing equipment and processes in the manufacturing area. This includes creating user requirements specifications, validation and production documentation, and conducting risk assessments (d/pFMEA) for processes and equipment.
* Implementing and supporting continuous improvements to new and existing processes and equipment within automated filling lines.
* Participating in or leading product and process development teams that specify, build, test, and evaluate product and process designs to enhance efficacy, reliability, serviceability, manufacturability, and cost management.
* Identifying opportunities to improve manufacturing processes by structuring, developing, and analyzing production data.
* Lead root cause analysis for process and production nonconformities.

**The essential requirements of the job include:**

* Bachelor or Master of Science in Process/Manufacturing Engineering or related field.
* 7+ years of relevant professional experience.
* Strong Problem-solving ability, including demonstrated ability to effectively design, execute, report on, and draw conclusions from experiments.
* Proficient in validation of equipment and processes.
* Skilled in risk analytics tools (p/dFMEA) and creating User Requirement specifications.
* Experience analyzing and drawing conclusions from production data using Power BI or similar software.
* Excellent communication, written and oral presentation skills in English.

**It would be a plus if you also possess previous experience in:**

* Six Sigma Black belt certification.
* Experienced in using and creating P&I Diagram.


Cepheid, a Danaher operating company, offers a broad array of comprehensive, competitive benefit programs that add value to our lives. Whether it’s a health care program or paid time off, our programs contribute to life beyond the job. Check out our benefits at danaherbenefitsinfo.com.


Join our winning team today. Together, we’ll accelerate the real-life impact of tomorrow’s science and technology. We partner with customers across the globe to help them solve their most complex challenges, architecting solutions that bring the power of science to life.


For more information, visit www.danaher.com.
company_description: Our mission is to deliver a better way to improve patient outcomes by enabling access to molecular diagnostic testing everywhere.
